character.description: Saturn makes part of Team Galactic`s Commander foursome. Unlike the games, he knows about his syndicate`s goal to capture Dialga and Palkia. Saturn made his first appearance at the ending of "A Secret Sphere of Influence!", though it was a brief appearance at the end of the episode. He, along with the other Team Galactic Grunts, commented that Jessie, James and Meowth did a lousy job at stealing the Adamant Orb for them, and framing Nando for the crime. Saturn later reappeared in "Journey to the Unown!", along with his Bronzor. He managed to steal a cube that was under the guard of the Unown of the Solaceon Ruins and brought it with him back to the Team Galactic HQ. Saturn appeared again in "Enter Galactic!", with the cube he obtained in "Journey to the Unown!", which he exposed to the meteorites in Veilstone City, transforming it into the Spear Key. Later, he and a few Galactic Grunts went to go steal the meteorites, but ended up meeting Ash and his friends for the first time. He also battles Brock and his Croagunk with his own Toxicroak, but it ends in a draw, as Team Galactic retreats and fails their mission. He appeared in DP096 and DP097, along with Cyrus, Jupiter and Mars. They stole the Lustrous Orb and the Adamant Orb from the Celestic Town museum.

character.name: Pluto
character.description: Charon is a scientist and one of Team Galactic`s four Commanders. He was first seen at the Team Galactic base but didn`t play a large role until later in the series when he was trying to find the ruins in Mt. Coronet.

character.name: Satoshi
character.description: The Beginning Ash is the main character of the Pokémon anime. Raised in Pallet Town, he started his journey to become a Pokémon Master at the age of 10. On the day that he started his journey, Ash carelessly woke up late despite being told by his mother, Delia Ketchum to get to bed. He rushed to Professor Samual Oak`s laboratory only to find out that the beginner Pokémon - Bulbasaur, Squirtle, and Charmander - had already been given out to trainers who arrived on time. However, Professor Samual Oak mentioned that there was one more Pokémon available - Pikachu. Despite constantly hitting Ash with Electric-type attacks and refusing to return to its PokéBall, Ash decided to take Pikachu along with him on his journey to become a Pokémon Master. Pikachu is cold towards Ash at first and laughs at his failures; however, when Ash saves Pikachu from a flock of wild Spearow, he begins to warm up to his new trainer and the two finally become friends. After the battle with the flock of Spearow, a Ho-Oh is seen flying towards a rainbow in the sky. The PokéDex reveals that the Ho-Oh is an unidentified Pokémon. Thus, the journey of Ash and Pikachu begins. Captures in Viridian Forest While making his way towards Pewter City and his first Kanto League Gym Battle, Ash came upon a wild Caterpie deep within Viridian Forest. Instead of using Pikachu to battle against the wild Pokémon, Ash took his chances and threw a PokéBall without weakining the Caterpie first. Luckily, he was able to catch the Pokémon without any trouble. The capture of Ash`s Caterpie marked Ash`s first capture as a Pokémon Trainer, making Ash`s Caterpie the second Pokémon to join his team. The next day, while continuing the trek through the Viridian Forest, Ash came up on a wild Pidgeotto. He tried to just throw a PokéBall like he did with Ash`s Caterpie, but Pidgeotto swatted the PokéBall away. Misty informed that he must weaken the Pokémon first before attempting to capture it. He called out Ash`s Caterpie to battle against, but Misty quickly informed him that Bug-type Pokémon are weak against Flying-type Pokémon like Pidgeotto. After Pidgeotto dealt significant damage to Ash`s Caterpie, Ash recalled it and sent out Pikachu. Pikachu was able to use its Thundershock to weaken Pidgeotto and allow Ash to capture it with a PokéBall. Thus, this capture marked Ash`s second capture as a Pokémon Trainer, making Ash`s Pidgeotto the third Pokémon to join his team. Later on, while still in the Viridian Forest, Ash was approached by Team Rocket, who attempted to steal his Pokémon. After defeating Meowth, James`s Koffing, and Jessie`s Ekans, Ash`s Caterpie evolved into Ash`s Metapod. Some of Ash`s greatest accomplishments have been at the various Pokémon Leagues. He was the victor at the Orange League and the Battle Frontier. He also competed in the Indigo League and the Johto Silver Conference where he placed admirably in both those competitions as well. Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup Ash participated in the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round he was in the fifth match and faced off against Marris. The match was quickly showcased and Ash won the battle and advanced to the second round while Marris was eliminated from the tournament. The Isshu League Ash participated in the Isshu League in the preliminary match where he was matched up against Trip. Trip`s Serperior was sent out to battle Pikachu and Cilan noted that Trip`s Serperior`s speed and its attack power had leveled up quite a bit too since the last time they saw it. The match was pretty one sided for a long time as Pikachu wasn`t able to counter Trip`s Serperior speed and ended up getting wrapped up. After using Iron Tail on the ground to get loose, Pikachu used a combination attack of Iron Tail and Electro Ball to one hit KO Trip`s Serperior. As a result, Trip was eliminated from the Isshu League and Ash advanced to the next round. The two met in the Pokémon Center after the battle, and Trip vowed that the next time they met that he would win. The two shook hands and parted ways. In the first main round, Ash`s opponent was shown on the match up electronic board but not much else is known about the battle. Ash`s Scraggy participated in the second main round of the Isshu League tournament where it faced off against a Darumakka. It was able to defeat it so that moved on to the next round. In the third round, Stephan was matched up against Ash. Cilan noted that the two of them have a very direct taste and that it would be a good battle. It was only a 3 on 3 battle but the both of them gave it their all. The first two battles of the third round setup the final match up of Stephan`s Sawk vs Ash`s Krookodile, both of which were very injured from the previous battles. Both of them did their best to muster up their reserve strength but in the end a surprise move of Aerial Ace by Ash`s Krookodile was super effective against Stephan`s Sawk and it knocked it out to give Ash the victory while eliminating Stephan from the tournament. Stephan realized after the battle that the reason that Ash withdrew Waruvial after the first battle was because Ash knew that Stephan would definitely send out Dageki, so he didn`t reveal that it knew Aerial Ace and saved until the end.

character.name: Pikachu (Satoshi)
character.description: The Beginning On the morning that Ash was to start his Pokémon journey, he woke up late and by the time he reached Professor Samual Oak`s laboratory, all of the beginner Pokémon were already taken. However, Professor Samual Oak did have one Pokémon left, a wild Pikachu. At first, Pikachu did not like Ash and would refuse to enter his PokéBall. He would often laugh at Ash`s failures and refused to listen to him. However, after Ash proved his loyalty to Pikachu by protecting him from a flock of Spearow, and thus began to earn Pikachu`s trust and respect. The two have since become best friends and Pikachu never leaves Ash`s side. Since the day Team Rocket first encountered Pikachu, it has been their sole goal to capture it. Day after day, their plan to capture Pikachu has been thwarted mainly due to Pikachu`s amazingly powerful Thunderbolt that keeps on blasting them off. On numerous occasions, Pikachu has made it evident that he is happy being a Pikachu and has no desire to evolve into a more powerful Raichu. It has proven time and time again that it is a powerful and worthy opponent to any Pokémon that dares to battle it. Gym Battle against Burgh`s Leavanny Pikachu was then sent out to battle Burgh`s Leavanny. Burgh`s Leavanny managed to tie up Pikachu with String Shot but unlike Ash`s Swadloon who was able to break free, Pikachu ended up getting hit with a couple of Leaf Storm attacks and a Hyper Beam before it rolled into another of Burgh`s Leavanny`s Leaf Storm attacks to break the string off its body so it could attack. Freed from the String Shot, Burgh`s Leavanny tried to tie it up again but Pikachu managed to avoid it with its speed and then knocked Burgh`s Leavanny out with a combination of Iron Tail and Electro Ball. Gym Battle against Elesa Elesa`s Emolga knocked out Ash`s Snivy and was then matched up with Pikachu. Pikachu made quick work of Elesa`s Emolga and knocked it out with one attack, its Iron Tail. Elesa`s Tynamo was the last Pokémon that she used in her gym battle against Ash. It was matched up against Pikachu who had just defeated her Emonga. Pikachu had a hard time defending against the fast Tackle attack that Elesa`s Tynamo kept hitting it with but Pikachu used its Thunderbolt to create a large dust cloud leaving only a small corridor for Pikachu to focus on it and so Elesa`s Tynamo couldn`t maneuver out of the way. Pikachu one hit K.O`d Elesa`s Tynamo with a Iron Tail. The loss gave Ash the overall victory. Battle against Alder`s Bouffalant Ash challenged Alder to a battle and he accepted though he had been walking all night and was actually quite tired. Alder sent out his Buffron to battle Pikachu but just as the battle started, Alder fell asleep standing up and didn`t give any orders to his Buffron. Alder`s Bouffalant stood still as Pikachu began hitting it with attack after attack until it Alder`s Bouffalant finally got mad at Alder and charged at him and set him flying into a tree. After that, Alder`s Bouffalant no longer wished to battle and Alder conceded the battle. Gym Battle against Skyla In Skyla air battle simulation, Ash`s Tranquill was matched up against Skyla`s Unfezant and since her Pokémon was the highest evolved form, she determined that her Pokémon would be the winner in that match-up. In the actual gym battle, Ash`s Tranquill was up against Skyla`s Unfezant which was the match-up just after Ash`s Tranquill had defeated Skyla`s Swoobat. Skyla`s Unfezant proved to be stronger and faster than Ash`s Tranquill, so Ash recalled it and set out Pikachu. Pikachu had a definite advantage over Skyla`s Unfezant with its electric attacks and it quickly knocked it out with its Electro Ball attack. Ash Just after Pikachu ended up knocking out Skyla`s Unfezant, Skyla`s Swanna was sent out to battle against it. Skyla had been watching her grandpa`s battle videos and noticed that he used the move Aqua Ring to defend against Electric attacks. She used that same defense against Pikachu which nullified its Electric attacks. It`s Iron Tail also couldn`t hit it so high in the air. Ash then noticed the rings in the air and Pikachu jumped up on them and managed to hit Skyla`s Swanna but not directly. Pikachu was now up in the air though and Skyla`s Swanna had the advantage there and it quickly knocked Pikachu out with a powerful Brave Bird attack. Battle Against Trip`s Serperior at the Isshu League Pikachu participated in the Isshu League in the preliminary match where it is was matched up against Trip`s Serperior. Cilan noted that Trip`s Serperior speed and its attack power had leveled up quite a bit too since the last time they saw it. The match was pretty one sided for a long time as Pikachu wasn`t able to counter its speed and ended up getting wrapped up. After using Iron Tail on the ground to get loose, Pikachu used a combination attack of Iron Tail and Electro Ball to one hit KO Trip`s Serperior. As a result, Trip was eliminated from the Isshu League and Ash advanced to the next round.

character.name: Tsubotsubo (Kosaburou)
character.description: Butch`s Shuckle battled Ash and Hippowdon.

character.name: Granbull (Yamato)
character.description: Cassidy`s Granbull battled Ash and Hippowdon.

character.name: Yanyanma (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie caught Yanma after Tyler battled and weakened it. After she captured it, Yanma was sent to Giovanni who later returned it.

character.name: Megayanma (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie caught Yanma and sent it to Giovanni. When he returned it to her she sent it into battle and it quickly evolved into Yanmega.

character.name: Habunake (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie`s Seviper was the first Pokémon she caught in Hoenn.

character.name: Sonans (Musashi)
character.description: While Wobbuffet is technically Jessie`s Pokémon, it has been around so long that it has become a main character, appearing in almost every episode of the series since it debut. Wobbuffet was first seen walking around with Benny, his previous trainer. Jessie traded her Lickitung for Wobbuffet and it has been with her ever since that day. Wobbuffet rarely battles but when he does, his Counter and Mirror Coat moves have proved to be very effective. Unfortunately, Jessie`s tactics aren`t always sufficient to master Wobbuffet`s superior defensive skills. Wobbuffet also randomly comes out of his Pokeball, especially during the Team Rocket motto. He is also seen blasting off with Jessie regardless if he was actually part of the action.

character.name: Sabonea (Natane)
character.description: James`s Cacnea was the first Pokémon he caught after coming to the Hoenn region. James later gave it to Gardenia to help it improve its skills.

character.name: Muskippa (Kojirou)
character.description: James originally caught Carnivine in the Great Marsh as a boy.

character.name: Manene (Kojirou)
character.description: Mime Jr. previously resided with the old couple who took care of an old vacation castle that James`s family owns.

character.name: Chirean (Kojirou)
character.description: James left Chimecho with elderly caretakers at his old vacation home near Saffron City.

character.name: Persian (Sakaki)
character.description: Persian is Giovanni`s pet and it rarely does anything else except sit beside Giovanni and wait for it to be pet by him. Meowth has always been jealous of Persian because he used to be a favorite of Giovanni but Persian took his place. Persian and Meowth are rivals and Meowth hopes to one day return to good graces with Giovanni to become his trusted pet and kick Persian out.

character.name: Hikari
character.description: Hikari is a 10-year-old Pokemon trainer and coordinator that travels with Ash Ketchum during Pokémon: Diamond & Pearl. Following in her mother`s footsteps as a coordinator, she chooses a Piplup, which she had already befriended at an earlier point, and sets out with the goal of winning the Grand Festival. After meeting Ash and Brock, she becomes rivals with another coordinator, Zoey, as well as her childhood friend, Kenny and goes on to win the Floaroma Ribbon, the Wallace Cup`s Aqua Ribbon, the Celestic Ribbon and the Chocovine Town Ribbon. Before entering her third contest, Dawn was very confident in herself, training with her Pokémon before every contest. However, after entering the Hearthome City Contest, Dawn started to lose confidence after she became the first coordinator to not pass the first round for the contest.

character.name: Ookido Yukinari-hakase
character.description: He is a Pokémon researcher that was once a competitive Trainer, and is generally considered the best in his field. As such, his role in the Pokémon games and anime is that of a mentor to young Pokémon Trainers, a source of information and an occasional plot device. Amongst other things, he is credited with inventing the Pokédex. He also hands out a Bulbasaur, Squirtle, or Charmander to beginning trainers (depending on which Pokémon the trainer chooses) to start their adventure in the Kanto Region. Although he is an expert on all matters relating to Pokémon, Professor Oak specializes in Pokémon behavioural science. He appears in Pokémon 4Ever as a child who was pulled into the future by Celebi. Additionally, it is apparent after Pokémon 3: The Movie that he knew Delia Ketchum since she was a child; this most likely is the reason he occasionally exhibits parental-type concern (mainly in the form of scolding Ash as he is doing something that is dangerous). He also creates poems centred around Pokémon and is known as the rhyming professor by Dawn.

character.name: Kasumi
character.description: Misty is the Gym Leader of Cerulean City Gym. Ash first met her when she pulled him out of the lake while fishing. He took her bike and head off towards the nearest Pokemon Center to help Pikachu. Pikachu later fried her bike and she got mad and wanted Ash to replace it. Misty has always had a bit of a crush on Ash and it was one of the reasons she decided to travel with him. After traveling with Ash through Kanto, the Orange Islands and the Johto regions, Misty returned to her position as the Cerulean City Gym Leader while her sisters went on a trip around the world. Misty is a devote Water Pokémon trainer and she specializes in Water-type Pokémon. On the other hand, Misty completely despises Bug-type Pokémon and avoids them whenever possible.

character.name: Takeshi
character.description: Brock was the Gym Leader of the Pewter Gym but during his travels abroad, his family has taken over the gym in his absence. Brock goal is to become a Pokémon Breeder and learn as much about Pokémon as he possibly can. Brock was impressed with Ash during their first encounter when Ash challenged him to a Gym Battle. Brock decided to journey with Ash and together they have explored many regions. Brock is also known for his obsession with girls. Almost every girl Brock sees, he immediately falls in love with. Misty, Max and most recently his Pokémon Croagunk have always been there to keep him in check before scaring off the girls with his overbearing introductions. He is also an expert on Nurse Joy and Officer Jenny as he recognizes all the differences in their personalities and features where as other people cannot tell the difference.

character.name: Kenji
character.description: Tracey is a Pokémon Watcher that traveled with Ash during the Orange Islands. He is currently staying and studying with Professor Oak in Pallet Town. He also takes care of Ash`s Pokémon that are residing at the Professors laboratory. Tracey is a very good artist and enjoys drawing. His artistic skills have been a benefit to him as a Pokémon Watcher as he is able to quickly sketch a scene with great detail. While journeying with Ash and Misty, Tracey replaced Brock in their group as Brock stayed with Professor Ivy for awhile. Tracey proved that he was quite knowledgeable about the many various aspects of Pokémon which greatly benefited Ash and Misty.

character.name: Tube Queen Azami
character.description: Lucy is the Frontier Brain of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Pike.

character.name: Tower Tycoon Lila
character.description: Anabel is the Frontier Brain that runs the Battle Frontier`s Battle Tower.

character.name: Ookido Shigeru
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament: With 10 Gym Badges, Gary Oak took his confidence and slight arogance from his Pokémon journey so far into the Kanto Pokémon League and continued to torment Ash who had also made it into the Kanto Pokémon League. Gary`s first battle was on the ice field which he won easily, keeping all of his Pokémon from being KO`ed in the process. Round 4 - Grass Field - Vs Melissa. It down to the last Pokémon of both Gary and Melissa to see whom would proceed to the final 16 of the Kanto Pokémon League. Towards the end of the battle Gary`s Nidoking faced off against Melissa`s Golem and both Pokémon looked tired. Gary ordered his Nidoking to use a Horn Attack, but Golem anticipated the move and managed to grab onto the horn and maintained a firm grip on it. In the final move of the round Golem used Seismic Toss on Nidoking, smashing it into the rock arena. When the dust settled Nidoking had been eliminated and Gary had been knocked out of the tournament. Gary fell to his knees from the shock of the defeat and did not decide to stay to the end of the tournament, instead he left the Indigo Plateau with his distraught cheerleaders.

character.name: Hanako
character.description: Delia is the mother of Ash Ketchum and she resides in Pallet town with a Mr. Mime she befriended.

character.name: Betbeton (Satoshi)
character.description: Caught by Ash. Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field Despite looking like a weak opponent Jeanette`s Bellsprout managed to KO both Ash`s Bulbasaur and his Pikachu. Ash turned to Muk who he transferred from Prof. Oak just before the battle. Due to Muk`s slow speed and bigger size it could not avoid Bellsprouts attack but thanks to its slimy and elastic body it was simply able to absorb them and not feel any damage. Bellsprout continued to launch a number of ounches, kicks and throws but still Muk absorbed them all. After repelling a Razor Leaf attack Muk smothered Bellsprout with its body and after a few seconds of struggling Bellsprout was defeated, giving Ash the victory and earned him a place in the final 16. Please with its victory it gave Ash a hug which forced Ash to the ground. Ash laughed and praised Muk for giving him the victory.

character.name: Junsaa
character.description: She is part of a family of policewomen found in almost every town. All of her sisters are named the same, and look identical. They are responsible for enforcing the law, and are often called on when Team Rocket is causing trouble. They typically use Growlithe as an attacking Pokemon. They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various officers apart. The Officer Jennys that are apart of the Orange Islands Police Force have lighter uniforms than those of the Kanto Region.

character.name: Joy
character.description: She is part of a large family of nurses, found in almost every town. Her sisters are named the same and look identical. They are responsible for healing sick and injured Pokemon, as well as the registration for various tournaments and contests. They use Chanseys as their assistants. They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various nurses apart.

character.name: Lucky (Joy)
character.description: Nurse Joy`s Chansey works at the Pokemon Center to help with injured Pokemon.

character.name: Caterpie (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Caterpie was the first wild Pokémon Ash caught.

character.name: Butterfree (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Metapod evolved into a Butterfree while trying to protect Ash from a Beedrill.

character.name: Fushigidane (Satoshi)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Jeanette Fisher - Grass Field Ash selected Bulbasaur as his first Pokémon whilst Jeanette choose her Beedrill. As the faster Pokémon, Beedrill charged at bulbasaur at full speed, however Bulbasaur mananged to evade and return a Razor Leaf attack. Once again Beedrill used its superior speed, avoiding the Razor Leaf attack whilst also getting itself in a good position to use a Twin Needle atttack on Bulbasaur. Despite being on the backfoot, Bulbasaur managed to dodge the Twin Needle attack and Beedrill`s Stinger. After jumping backwards, Bulbasaur created enough space to be able to use its Leech Seed attack which struck Beedrill on its attacking stinger. Beedril was stuck in Leech Seed forcing it to the floor and Ash had bulbasaur finish it off using a Tackle attack which gave Ash the Initial Advantage in the battle. Like Beedrill, Scyther had an advantage in speed and used this by quickly trying to attack Bulbasaur with its blades. After beeing unsuccessful, Jeanette order Scyther to used a Swift attack which managed to hit Bulbasaur a few times and was useful in deflecting its Vine Whip attack. Jeanette ordered Scyther to use a Double Team attack to which Ash had Bulbasaur to attempt to hit the real Scyther. The attempt failed and Scyther was able to land a few strikes by charging at Bulbasaur and managed to evade Bulbasaur`s counter of a Razor Leaf and Vine Whip attack. Ash had Bulbasaur use its Vine Whip once more but told it to swing the vines towards all of the copies which Double Team created, knowing that Bulbasaur would have to hit the real one in the process. The plan worked and Scyther was struck by Vine Whip, eliminating it from the battle. Jeanette released her final Pokémon of the round which was a Bellsprout. Her choice suprised her a few people including Bulbasaur, as by apperance alone Bellsprout could be considered a weak Pokémon. Ash had Bulbasaur charge at Bellsprout but managed to flip it above its head using its own momentum against itself. Ash was stunned by Bellsprout`s agility. Bulbasaur was angered at being tossed aside so easily and charged once again at Bellsprout, but like before, was thrown away using its own momentum. Bellsprout took advantage of Bulbasaur being on the floor and thrown it towards Ash`s podium, showing great strength and eliminated Bulbasaur from the tie. Ash quickly rushed Pikachu into battle to try and finish Bellsprout off. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Bulbasaur was Ash`s fifth choice Pokémon in his winner`s trophy battle against Drake. Bulbasaur`s first opponent was against Drake`s Electabuzz. Bulbasuar manage to shake of Electabuzz`s initial Thundershock attack and returned a Razor Leaf attack which struck Electabuzz, although, whilst being hit by Razor Leaf, Electabuzz manage to use a Thunderbolt attack that Bulbasaur quickly dodged. Bulbasaur uses Tackle and causes some light damage to Electabuzz but taking advantage of how close Bulbasur was, it manage to hit Bulbasaur with a Thunderpunch which eliminated it. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Bayleaf (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Chikorita evolved into Bayleef to protect Ash from Team Rocket.

character.name: Hinoarashi (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash was separated from his friends and chased by Team Rocket into a cave where he found Cyndaquil.

character.name: Waninoko (Satoshi)
character.description: Totodile first appeared while Ash and Misty were fishing. Both tried to capture it but it hid in the bushes.

character.name: Yorunozuku (Satoshi)
character.description: After Ash rescued Noctowl from Team Rocket, Ash battled and captured it.

character.name: Heracros (Satoshi)
character.description: In a forest outside of New Bark Town, Ash solved a territory dispute between the local Heracross and Pinsir. Afterwards one of the Heracross who grew fond of Ash and his Bulbasaur decided to accompany him on his Johto journey. Heracross was sent to Professor Oak in exchange for one of his Tauros, however, when Ash wanted to trade back Professor asked for more time to study Heracross to which Ash agreed. Heracross was eventually recalled and it competed with Ash as his trainer in the Silver Conference but remained at Oak`s Laboratory when Ash departed for the Hoenn region. It is a strong, loyal yet slightly docile Pokémon whose feats of strength include lifting a big mechanical Pinsir and defeating Gary Oak`s Magmar at the Silver Conference despite a type disadvantage.

character.name: Rumika
character.description: Jessiebelle is the woman appointed by James`s parents to be his fiancée.

character.name: Maman
character.description: She is James`s Mother and a wealthy aristocrat. Both of James`s parents want James to marry Jessiebell, a girl they beleive will turn him into a real man.

character.name: Papan
character.description: He is James`s Father and a wealthy aristocrat. Both of James`s parents want James to marry Jessiebell, a girl they beleive will turn him into a real man.

character.name: Ruffresia (Rumika)
character.description: Jessiebell`s Vileplume which she uses to stun James. Jessiebell has owned Vileplume since it was an Oddish.

character.name: Gardie (Kojirou)
character.description: James`s loyal Growlithe has helped save James from Jessiebell on countless occasions. When James left his home, Growlie stayed at home in its own mansion. James later re-encounted Growlie at one of the mansions in the Sinnoh region. It was able to smell James under his disguise. When the treasure chest turned into a mecha, James`s Growlithe was injured by one of the missiles. James told Pikachu to blast Team Rocket off to escape Jessibelle and he said goodbye to his loyal Growlithe.

character.name: Gardie (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Growlithe which are regularly used as a part of the Police Force.

character.name: Police Officer
character.description: A member of the Police Force

character.name: Nyarth
character.description: Meowzie used to be a very pampered pet belonging to a rich lady and was even kept in a jewel encrusted Pokéball. Meowth first met Meowzie when he was just a street cat and fell in love with Meowzie. Although, Meowzie rejected him as her owner could buy her anything she wanted and Meowth could offer her nothing. After Meowth attempted to make himself more human by learning to walk on two legs and learning how to talk, Meowzie still rejected him as she thought she had turned into a freak cat. However, after losing her fortunate, the rich lady abandoned Meowzie in the city of Hollywood and Meowzie wandered the street until she joined a local gang of Meowth led by a Persian. It was in fact, the same gang Meowth had been apart of when he was a street cat but Meowth had already left Hollywood by this time. When Meowth returned to Hollywood he was suprised to find Meowzie when the street gang and wanted to take her away. Meowth defeated the gang leader Persian in a duel but Meowzie once again shunned Meowth instead deciding to stay with Persian as it was the Pokémon that took her in during her time of need.

character.name: Tamaranze-kaichou
character.description: Charles Goodshow is the president of the Pokémon League and governs the tournaments held accross different tournaments including Kanto, Johto and Heonn. He is also responsible for the Moltres flame which he uses to keep the torches held by the runners lit. When he saw Ash Ketchum`s spirit and attitude he allowed Ash, Misty and Brock be a runner and hold the events torch lit by the Moltress flame

character.name: Kamex (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Blastoise was revealed to Ash when Gary sent it out to battle Heracross.

character.name: Blacky (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Gary`s Eevee evolved into Umbreon sometime after he left for his journey in the Johto region.

character.name: Delibird (Rocket-dan)
character.description: Team Rocket`s Delibird delivers parcels to field agents around the world.

character.name: Saburou
character.description: Salvadore is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Yomoko
character.description: Yolanda is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Gorou
character.description: Tommy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Mutsuko
character.description: Cindy is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Nanako
character.description: Suzie is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Yaoki
character.description: Timmy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Kurou
character.description: Billy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Tooko
character.description: Tilly is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Happinas (Joy)
character.description: Chansey enrolled at a school that was designed specifically for Chansey. It struggled at first but managed to befriend a Jessie who was taking the same course despite being a human. Jessie helped Chansey in its study and started to do well on the course unlike Jessie who could not stay awake during the Chansey`s Sing ability, which was used to lull restless Pokémon to sleep. Just before Jessie left the college, the Chansey that she made friends with, which had just graduated managed to catch up with Jessie and tried to persuade her to finish the course. Jessie explained that she would not be able to finish the course and so Chansey snapped its graduation medal in half and get one half to Jessie as a token of their friendship. During the next few years Chansey evolved into a Blissey and manage to land a nursing position in a Pokémon Centre in Happy Town in the Johto region despite remaining slightly clumsey and over-eager to help at times. Some time later it was reunited with Jessie when they met in a Pokémon Centre in Johto. Blissey tried helping Jessie by giving her the food that was stored in the Pokémon Centre. Blissey was caught on the Pokémon security cameras taking food from the Pokémon Centre`s storeroom and faced losing its position as a nurse. Jessie did not want Blissey to lose its dream job which it worked hard for so James, Meowth and herself claimed they tricked Blissey into giving the food away and even attacked Blissey to make it look convincing. Ash Ketchum made Jessie, James and Meowth blast off but not before Jessie ensured the events at the Pokémon centre will be kept a secret. Blissey and Jessie kept their pieces of the graduation medal and remained friends. [hr] Alolan Region Pokémon Centers Nurse Joy`s Blissey are also great companions to the Joy`s in the Alola region. They sense sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokémon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.

character.name: Akane
character.description: Whitney is the Gym Leader of the Goldenrod Gym.

character.name: Miltank (Akane)
character.description: Miltank first appeared during the gym battle against Ash.

character.name: Matsuba
character.description: Morty is the Gym Leader of the Ecruteak Gym.

character.name: Gangar (Matsuba)
character.description: Morty`s Gengar loves to play tricks on people who enter the Burned Tower.

character.name: Mikan
character.description: Jasmine is the Gym Leader of the Olivine Gym and she also runs the Glitter Lighthouse in Olivine City where her Ampharos is stationed. She first met Ash and his friends at the lighthouse when her Ampharos was sick. Ash went and got some medicine for it. At a later time, Ash challenged Jasmine for a gym badge. Ash`s Pikachu and Cyndaquil battled against her and proved to be a sufficient combo in order to defeat her and obtain the Mineral Badge. Jasmine met up with Ash and Brock in Sunyshore City in the Sinnoh region. She met Dawn and the Sinnoh Elite Four member Flint. She challenged him to a battle with her Steelix but Flint used his Infernape which had a significant type advantage as well as being his most powerful Pokémon. Jasmine was easily defeated by Flint.

character.name: Denryu (Mikan)
character.description: Jasmine`s Ampharos lights the Glitter Lighthouse in Olivine City.

character.name: Haganeil (Mikan)
character.description: Ash challenged Jasmine for the Mineral Badge and she sent her Steelix out after Pikachu defeated her Magnemite. Steelix was able to knock out Pikachu as it was tired from its previous battle. Jasmine`s Steelix was then defeated by Ash`s Cyndaquil as two proved to be a sufficient combo to defeat Steelix. While at Sunyshore City in the Sinnoh region, Jasmine met the Sinnoh Elite Four member Flint. She challenged him to a battle with her Steelix but Flint used his Infernape which had a significant type advantage as well as being his most powerful Pokémon. Jasmine`s Steelix was easily defeated by Flint`s Infernape.

character.name: Ibuki
character.description: Clair is the Gym Leader of the Blackthorn Gym.

character.name: Hakuryuu (Ibuki)
character.description: Clair`s Dratini evolved into Dragonair just after Team Rocket attempted to steal it.

character.name: Haruka
character.description: Haruka is a Pokemon Coordinator from Petalburg City. Starting off her journey, Haruka did not like Pokemon very much. She originally wanted to be a Pokemon Trainer so she could travel and see the world. On the day she got her starter Pokemon, http://anidb.net/ch23625 [Achamo], Haruka met Satoshi and like Kasumi was impressed by Satoshi`s personality. She traveled with Satoshi, her brother Masato and Takeshi until she decided to part ways an compete in the Johto region. Having decided to focus on being a Pokemon Coordinator instead of a Pokemon Trainer, Haruka experience great success during the many Contests she entered. She has competed in the Kanto and Houen Grand Festivals as well as the Wallace Cup where she reached the finals only to loose to Hikari. Haruka is also popular with the fanboys for her well endowed feminine body features. She isn`t shy about showing off her body as well by posing in her various swimming attire.

character.name: Masato
character.description: Masato is the younger sibling of http://anidb.net/ch23585 [Haruka]. He lives in Petalburg City with his family. He traveled with Satoshi, Takeshi and his sister Haruka throughout Houen and Kanto. He returned home after his sister went to Johto and Satoshi and Takeshi went to Sinnoh. Masato knows a lot about Pokemon even though he is quite young. He tries to learn as much about Pokemon as he can so that when he turns 10, he will be prepared to start his own journey to become a great Pokemon Trainer. Since Kasumi was no longer traveling with Takeshi and Satoshi, Masato took up the role of dragging Takeshi away from the girls by the ear.

character.name: Eipam (Hikari)
character.description: Ash captured this originally pesky Pokémon during the Grand Festival. He later traded it to Dawn in exchange for Buizel.

character.name: Donfan (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Donphan evolved during a battle against Team Rocket.

character.name: Jukain (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Sceptile evolved when Nurse Joy`s Meganium was attacked by Team Rocket and it wanted to protect it.

character.name: Ohsubame (Satoshi)
character.description: Taillow evolved into Swellow in the final round of the Crossgate Town`s annual PokéRinger Tournament.

character.name: Cotoise (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Torkoal were traveling through the Valley of Steel when they saw Torkoal being attacked.

character.name: Onigohri (Satoshi)
character.description: Snorunt evolved into Glalie while May was participating in the Grand Festival.

character.name: Haganeil (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Steelix evolved while Brock was away.

character.name: Usohachi (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock captured Bonsly while Ash, May, Max and himself were training at a ninja school.

character.name: Sukizou-san
character.description: Sukizou rarely says much except his catch phrase "I like it" (好きですね). In the English dub, his phrase is "Remarkable".

character.name: Contesta
character.description: Contesta is the main Pokémon contest judge.

character.name: Elekible (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Gary`s Electivire first appearance was just outside Pallet Town. It was shooting at apples with its Thunderbolt until Team Rocket attempted to take it by capturing it in an electricity-proof net.

character.name: Hinata
character.description: Solana is a Pokémon Ranger who has climbed up the ranks and is now a rank 10 ranger. She likes to have information on the Pokémon she is helping and is often seen with her Plusle riding on her shoulder. Ash and his friends first encountered Solana in the Kanto region as she was investigating the strange growth of some vines in a forest. It ended up that Celebi was there and with Ash`s help they were able to care for the injured Celebi. She once again met up with Ash and friends when she was sent to investigate geomagnetic interference. Upon further investigation it was discovered that Deoxys was in the vicinity and had crashed on the planet in a meteor impact a few years earlier. After befriending Max, Deoxys decided that it wanted to explore more of the world and Solana was able to report back to the Ranger Union that the mission was completed. While in the Sinnoh region, Ash encountered a rare Riolu that knew how to use Aura Sphere. It had been kidnapped from the Lucario Kingdom. Kellyn and Solana, where sent to track it down and with the strong bond Riolu made with Ash, the Riolu was returned back home. It is said that when at first she met Kellyn in the Sinnoh region, she was jealous of his popularity with the girls because of his ranking and of his looks. She then heard that he didn`t ever notice the girls, and was assigned to work with her. At first, she barley talked to him, she found a liking of him when she saw how good and humble he was when they succeeded.

character.name: Pyramid King Jindai
character.description: Pyramid King Brandon is a Frontier Brain and chief of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Pyramid. He is a known explorer as he travels around the world in his Pyramid in search of rare and unique Pokémon. He is also a very formidable battling opponent who will gives his challengers advice on their strategies for battling him if they lose. Those that defeat him are awarded the Battle Frontier Brave Symbol. Ash first battle Brandon while he was possessed by the spirit of the King of Pokélantis. Brandon defeated the possessed Ash but he allowed a rematch due to the circumstances. He told Ash in advance that he would be using Registeel for the battle. In their first normal Frontier challenge battle, Brandon defeated Ash with his Registeel even though Ash`s Torkoal battle well. Brandon once again agreed to battle Ash but he first had to go in search of a rare Pokémon. In his final battle against Ash, he decided to have a 4-on-4 battle instead of the 1-on-1 battles they had in the previous fights. Brandon used his Dusclops, Ninjask, Solrock, and Regice which Ash managed to defeat with his Charizard, Bulbasaur, Squirtle and Pikachu. Brandon was impressed with how well Ash had trained his Pokémon as well has how mature a battler he had become. Brandon appeared with his Pyramid in the at Sinnoh region`s Snowpoint Temple where he once again met up with Ash. While there Paul showed up and it was revealed that Paul`s brother Reggie had once battled against Brandon for the Battle Frontier Brave Symbol and lost. Paul challenged Brandon and lost in a 6-on-6 full battle. Brandon encountered a Regigigas at the Snowpoint Temple after Pokémon Hunter J attempted to revive and capture it. With Brandon`s help, and help from Brandon`s Regi`s, Regigigas was returned to the temple and Brandon promised to watch over the temple.

character.name: Regice (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon captured Regice in between Overjoyed! and Gathering the Gang of Four! while searching in a ruin.

character.name: Senri
character.description: Norman is the Gym Leader of the Petalburg Gym. He is also the father of May and Max.

character.name: Kekking (Senri)
character.description: Norman`s Slaking battled against Ash`s Grovyle.

character.name: Shuu
character.description: Drew is a Pokémon Coordinator from LaRousse City and May`s biggest rival.

character.name: Harley
character.description: Harley is a Coordinator from Slateport City.

character.name: Bursyamo (Haruka)
character.description: May`s Blaziken evolved when Team Rocket was attempting to steal Pikachu during the break at a Pokémon Contest.

character.name: Agehunt (Haruka)
character.description: May`s Silcoon evolved into Beautifly.

character.name: Gonbe (Haruka)
character.description: May caught Munchlax after she found out that it liked the Pokeblocks that she had made.

character.name: Pukurin (Harley)
character.description: Harley`s Wigglytuff battled against May in the Indigo Grand Festival.

character.name: Saori
character.description: Solidad is a Pokémon Coordinator from Pewter City.

character.name: Mitsuko
character.description: Caroline is the mother of May and Max.

character.name: Zenigame (Haruka)
character.description: May kept the Squirtle that Professor Oak had at his lab when she was visiting.

character.name: Eneco (Haruka)
character.description: Skitty had wandered in the desert and it lost its sense of smell. Brock suggested they take it to a Pokémon Aromatherapy Center where it recovered after it was sprayed with some medicine.

character.name: Adan
character.description: Juan is the Gym Leader of the Sootopolis Gym.

character.name: Mizuho
character.description: Lola is Brock`s Mother.

character.name: Registeel (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon told Ash that he`d be using Registeel as one of his Pokemon in his rematch battle.

character.name: Regirock (Pyramid King Jindai)
character.description: Brandon`s Regirock was first seen using Focus Punch to destroy a boulder that was heading towards Ash and his friends.

character.name: Factory Head Datsura
character.description: Noland is the Frontier Brain in charge of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Factory.

character.name: Freezer (Factory Head Datsura)
character.description: Noland`s Articuno battled against Ash`s Charizard.

character.name: Babaya
character.description: Nanny and Pop-Pop are servants of James`s parents who takes care of a castle, one of the family`s vacation homes.

character.name: Jiiya
character.description: Nanny and Pop-Pop are servants of James`s parents who takes care of a castle, one of the family`s vacation homes.

character.name: Arena Captain Kogomi
character.description: Greta is the Frontier Brain of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Arena.

character.name: Charem (Arena Captain Kogomi)
character.description: Greta`s Medicham was sent out to battle against Ash.

character.name: Dome Superstar Heath
character.description: Tucker is the Frontier Brain of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Dome.

character.name: Laglarge (Dome Superstar Heath)
character.description: Tucker`s Swampert battled against Ash`s Corphish and Ash`s Swellow.

character.name: Windie (Dome Superstar Heath)
character.description: Tucker`s Arcanine battled against Ash`s Corphish and Swellow.

character.name: Milokaross (Tube Queen Azami)
character.description: Lucy`s Milotic battled against Ash at the Battle Tube.

character.name: Palace Guardian Ukon
character.description: Spenser is the Frontier Brain of the Battle Frontier`s Battle Palace.

character.name: Nendoll (Palace Guardian Ukon)
character.description: Spenser`s Claydol battled against Ash during his Frontier Brain battle.

character.name: Eifie (Tower Tycoon Lila)
character.description: Anabel`s Espeon battled the second time Ash challenged Anabel.

character.name: Maril (Mizuho)
character.description: Lola`s Marill battled at the Pewter Gym.

character.name: Soutarou
character.description: Samuel is the assistant to the Battle Frontiers Pyramid King Brandon.

character.name: Gliger (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Gligar, along with many other Gliger and a Gliscor, became trapped in a city after being blown there by a violent windstorm.

character.name: Naetle (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash caught Turtwig near Clara`s home. It became friends with Clara and it broke up fights among wild Pokémon in the area.

character.name: Hayashigame (Satoshi)
character.description: During a battle with Paul, Ash`s Turtwig evolved into Grotle.

character.name: Hikozaru (Satoshi)
character.description: After Shinji released his Hikozaru it joined Satoshi`s team.

character.name: Mukkuru (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Starly is the first Pokémon he caught in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Mukubird (Satoshi)
character.description: Starly evolved into a Staravia during a battle with Team Rocket.

character.name: Buoysel (Satoshi)
character.description: When Ash and co. were traveling towards Daybreak Town for Dawn`s next Pokémon Contest, a mysterious Pokémon Trainer specializing in martial arts, named Clayton, challenged Ash and his Buizel to a battle after seeing how Buizel saved Gible who had fallen into a river. Clayton`s Mr. Mime proved to be a really strong opponent, though, as it managed to dodge Buizel`s Aqua Jet and SonicBoom attacks by skillfully using its Psychic and Double Team moves, eventually knocking Buizel out with a powerful ThunderPunch. Ash and Buizel, determined to make up for the loss by getting stronger, started training with Clayton`s help so that Buizel could learn a new move; Ice Punch. He told them that, in order to master the move, they had to work on improving their speed and concentration. At first, the progress of Ash`s Buizel`s training seemed to be really slow. However, after training overnight using unstable and light objects as targets for its punches, like floating leaves, Buizel managed to master the move completely. After the completion of Buizel`s training, Ash challenged Clayton to a rematch, and Clayton accepted. Ash`s Buizel proved to be more of a challenge for its opponent, Mr. Mime, this time and after activating its ability, Swift Swim, in the midst of the battle due to a sudden rain, Buizel managed to increase its speed and finish Clayton`s Mr. Mime off with a powerful Ice Punch. Clayton then acknowledged Ash`s Buizel`s improvement and praised its skills, but also put emphasis on the fact that Buizel still had a long way to go and had to keep on training.

character.name: Glion (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Gligar evolved into Gliscor in order to save Ash from a fall. It used the Razor Fang Ash received from Gary to evolve.

character.name: Usokkie (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Bonsly evolved into Sudowoodo after it escaped from a cage that Team Rocket caught it in.

character.name: Pinpuku (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock won Happiny`s egg in a Pokémon cosplay contest by entering his Croagunk dressed up as a Politoed. While traveling on Cycling Road, the egg began to glow. After taking it to a Pokémon Center, the egg hatched into Happiny.

character.name: Gureggru (Takeshi)
character.description: Team Rocket recruited Croagunk while they were running their fake Gym in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Ayako
character.description: Johanna is Dawn`s mother.

character.name: Nyarmar (Ayako)
character.description: Glameow appears to be Dawn`s family pet.

character.name: Nanakamado-hakase
character.description: Professor Rowan is the leading Pokémon authority in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Yuuzou
character.description: Yuzo is one of Professor Rowan`s assistants.

character.name: Pochama (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn`s first Pokémon that she got from Professor Rowan.

character.name: Kaniri
character.description: Mr. Cheeves seems to be the butler for James family retreat house in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Torami
character.description: Claudina is a truck driver who met Brock and allowed him to hitch a ride with her.

character.name: Nanakamado-hakase no Assistant
character.description: Professor Rowan`s Assistants help him manage his laboratory in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Shinji
character.description: Paul is a rival of Ash in the Sinnoh region. He has a very closed personality and doesn`t make friends very easily. He strives to find the strongest Pokémon he can possibly find and if they don`t meet his expectations he releases them. He faced Ash in a full battle and managed to defeat him by using some of his older Pokémon where as Ash only used Pokémon that he had caught in the Sinnoh region save only Pikachu. The two of them made a pact to have a rematch at the Sinnoh League. The two faced off in the quarter-final round of the Sinnoh League. Ash took the early lead by defeating Paul`s Aggron and Gastrodon. Paul fought back though defeating Buoysel, Staraptor and Torterra in a row. Infernape proved to be a powerful opponent and was able to defeat Paul. A bond between Ash and Paul was formed as they both began to respect each other after the battle. After loosing to Ash in the Sinnoh League, Paul returned home and then challenged Brandon of the Battle Frontier.

character.name: Elekid (Shinji)
character.description: This is the first Pokémon the audience sees Paul with.

character.name: Tougan
character.description: Byron is the Gym Leader of Canalave City Gym.

character.name: Hyouta
character.description: Roark is the Gym Leader of the Oreburgh Gym.

character.name: Tougan no Deshi
character.description: Byron`s Assistant refereed the Gym battle between Byron and Ash.

character.name: Dohmirror (Tougan)
character.description: Bronzor was the first Pokémon Byron used against Ash during the Gym Battle.

character.name: Haganeil (Tougan)
character.description: Steelix was the second Pokémon Byron used against Ash in his Gym Battle.

character.name: Trideps (Tougan)
character.description: Byron`s Bastiodon was the third and final Pokémon he used in the Gym Battle against Ash.

character.name: Naoshi
character.description: Nando is a minstrel who carries his golden harp that has a Mew shaped base to it. He is both a Pokémon Trainer and a Pokémon Coordinator. Nando competed in the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort after obtaining the 5 necessary ribbons in order to qualify for the event. At the opening party, he revealed to Ash that he had 7 Sinnoh badges. He faced Zoey in the Semi-final round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival but he was unable to defeat her and was eliminated from the competition.

character.name: Subomie (Naoshi)
character.description: Evolved in to Roselia.

character.name: Roselia (Naoshi)
character.description: Evolved from Budew during a battle with Ash and Pikachu.

character.name: Yukino
character.description: Clara is an older lady that lived near Turtwig and became friends with it.

character.name: Ringuma (Shinji)
character.description: Ash and his friends encountered an angry Ursaring while they were lost in a forest and it got mad and which started chasing them. While being chased by the Ursaring, Paul appeared and attacked the wild Ursaring with his Chimchar. Paul`s Chimchar weakened it enough to capture it and Paul decided to keep it after scanning its strength with his Pokédex.

character.name: Odoshishi (Shinji)
character.description: Paul caught this Pokémon to save Ash from it, but soon after catching it he released it as his Pokédex scan showed that it wasn`t as strong as he would like.

character.name: Momoan
character.description: Marian is the Sinnoh contest announcer.

character.name: Minae
character.description: Minnie attempted to challenge the fake gym that Team Rocket created.

character.name: Hassam (Minae)
character.description: Minnie`s Scizor was stolen by Team Rocket but eventually with the help of Ash and his friends, she managed to get it returned.

character.name: Garagara (Isana)
character.description: Jeffrey`s Marowak easily defeated Jessie`s Dustox during a fake Gym Battle.

character.name: Isana
character.description: Jeffrey challenged Jessie at Team Rocket`s fake gym.

character.name: Mimirol (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn battled many wild Buneary before she captured captured this Buneary.

character.name: Shachou
character.description: Shachou is the Pokétch Company President.

character.name: Teruhiko
character.description: Landis is the son of the Pokétch Company President.

character.name: Poketch Eigyou Man
character.description: The Pokétch salesperson informs Dawn that the Pokétch company had recalled all unsold Pokétches.

character.name: Kolink (Teruhiko)
character.description: Shinx gets hypnotized by Team Rocket`s device but is later saved by Ash and friends.

character.name: Nozomi
character.description: Zoey is a Pokémon coordinator and Dawn`s rival and friend. She is also good friends with Candice, the Gym Leader of Snowpoint City Gym. Zoey entered the Mikuri Cup tournament at the Lakeside Resort but lost against May in the semi-finals. Determined to do better, she continued training hard for the Sinnoh Grand Festival. She managed to get the 5 required ribbons to enter the Grand Festival before Dawn but with the assistance of Candice, they helped motivate Dawn to continue working hard so they could compete against each other. She managed to get through the Appeal round keeping their hopes alive to battle in the Grand Festival finals.

character.name: Nyarmar (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Glameow was first seen when it brought Dawn her missing choker around its tail. While Nozomi was young and attending the Kissaki City Trainers` School, she found an abandoned Nyarmar in a box in an alley. Nozomi kept the Nyarmar in the schools shed where it was also cared for by Suzuna. Teacher Ooishi found out about it pretty quickly but relented and allowed Suzuna and Nozocchi to take care of Nyarmar.

character.name: Muuma (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Misdreavus made its debut in the Jubilife contest by coming out of its Poké Ball covered in a purple fog.

character.name: Yukari
character.description: Rosebay is a Pokémon ornithologist. When Ash and his friends encounter her, she is in the process of observing the bird Pokémon in a forest between Jubilife and Oreburgh. She allows them to join her for a while, and shows them a Swablu nest in a nearby tree. Dawn notes the lack of any actual Swablu nearby, and Rosebay says the number of bird Pokémon in the forest has recently dropped very significantly, though she has no idea why. Using her binoculars, she`s able to ascertain that the bird Pokémon seem to disappear as they fly through a nearby valley. Along with Ash and the others, she heads there to investigate, and notices a giant trap set up by Team Rocket to catch the birds as they fly through. After the trap has been destroyed, the captive birds freed, and Team Rocket sent blasting off, she bids the group farewell.

character.name: Iwao
character.description: Ian is the gym assistant for the Oreburgh Gym.

character.name: Ishitsubute (Hyouta)
character.description: Roark`s Geodude battled against Paul`s Azumarill.

character.name: Marilli (Shinji)
character.description: It`s not made clear exactly when Paul caught his Azumarill, or even if he caught it in that form, but Ash and his friends first see it during Paul`s battle with Roark, the Gym Leader of Oreburgh City. Azumarill is first Pokémon Paul sends out in this battle, to counter Roark`s Geodude, but Geodude`s Hidden Power managed to deflect Azumarill`s Hydro Pump, and its following Rollout attack knocked Paul`s Pokémon out in one hit before it could get off another attack. Later that day, Paul gave Azumarill to a kid at the Pokémon Center, saying it was a lost cause.

character.name: Zugaidos (Hyouta)
character.description: Cranidos evolved into Rampardos during a fight with Team Rocket.

character.name: Kenzou
character.description: Dr. Kenzo appears to be the director of Oreburgh City`s museum`s fossil-restoration program.

character.name: Rampald (Hyouta)
character.description: Rampardos evolved during a fight with Team Rocket.

character.name: Pachirisu (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn captured Pachirisu which has a very hyperactive and mischievous personality.

character.name: J
character.description: J is a Pokémon Hunter that steals and sells the Pokémon requested by her clients for a profit.

character.name: Maria
character.description: Pokémon Hunter J stole her Gardevoir while gardening outside.

character.name: Dorapion (J)
character.description: J`s Drapion is one of her most powerful Pokémon.

character.name: Sirknight (Maria)
character.description: Gardevoir was stolen by the evil Pokémon Hunter J but was later saved by Ash and his friends and returned to Melodi.

character.name: J no Kyouhansha
character.description: J`s henchmen assist Pokémon Hunter J in her tasks to steal and sell Pokémon for her clients.

character.name: Windie (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Arcanine is a powerful and effective Pokemon which she uses to help her enforce the law.

character.name: Bohmander (J)
character.description: Pokémon Hunter J`s main Pokemon.

character.name: Golbat (J no Kyouhansha)
character.description: J`s Henchmen use Golbat against their enemies.

character.name: Sinnoh Now Cameraman
character.description: Sinnoh Now Reporter and Camera man interview Ash and his friends while in Jubilife City.

character.name: Hatsune
character.description: Haley is the leader of the B-Button League and the older sister of Oralie.

character.name: Otone
character.description: Oralie is the younger sister of Haley and is also a member of the B-Button League.

character.name: Koiking (Otone)
character.description: Oralie`s Magikarp battled against Dawn`s Piplup. It defeated Piplup by using Tackle. Ash battled her Magikarp as well with Pikachu but the battle never finished as Team Rocket interfered.

character.name: Shinka Kyouju
character.description: While the Magicarp salesman was explaining the Evolution Machine to James, he explained that the Professor had been working very hard to perfect the device.

character.name: Hinbass (Hatsune)
character.description: Feebas used Ice Beam to freeze Team Rocket and defeat them after it and Magikarp were captured.

character.name: Saibankan
character.description: The Village Judge assisted Nurse Joy in the unofficial Pokemon Contest entered by Dawn and Jessie.

character.name: Tamami
character.description: Theresa saw Ash`s Pikachu one day while Dawn and Ash were training and she asked to borrow it for her grandmother. Theresa explained that Abigail`s Pikachu, Sugar, had ran away.

character.name: Amano
character.description: Abigail`s granddaughter is Theresa. Her Pikachu, Sugar, ran away to try and find a way to toast Aspear Berries for a bake-off.

character.name: Raichuu (Amano)
character.description: Sugar evolved into a Raichu while looking for a way to toast Aspear Berries for a bake-off. It returned and rescued Pikachu from Team Rocket.

character.name: Tsubomi
character.description: Forsythia lives in Floaroma Town where she cares for her berry orchard and teaches Poffin cooking classes.

character.name: Kourei Josei
character.description: An old lady walks up to Ash and friends and assumes that it is their first time visiting Floaroma Town. Dawn tells her that she is here for the contest. Then Dawn compliments on the beautiful trees and flowers. The old lady agrees with Dawn. However, she tells a story about how Floaroma Town used to be a wasteland and that there was no beauty. But people believed a god came and provided the beauty to Floaroma Town. Ash and friends thank the old lady for sharing the story with them. Then the lady walks away.

character.name: Hassboh (Tsubomi)
character.description: Lotad is one of Forsythia`s Pokémon that helps her water the flowers in the field.

character.name: Roserade (Tsubomi)
character.description: Roserade protects the field of flowers from bad people like Team Rocket. Forsythia met Budew in a Pokémon Center as it was recovering from a fight with a couple of other Pokémon. Budew liked the look of the bouquet of flowers that Forsythia had. Forsythia gave Budew her red scarf and they became friends.

character.name: Subomie (Tsubomi)
character.description: Roserade protects the field of flowers from bad people like Team Rocket. Forsythia met Budew in a Pokémon Center as it was recovering from a fight with a couple of other Pokémon. Budew liked the look of the bouquet of flowers that Forsythia had. Forsythia gave Budew her red scarf and they became friends.

character.name: Kengo
character.description: Kenny is a Pokémon Coordinator and has known Dawn since they were young children. Like Dawn, he is also from Twinleaf Town. He is constantly teasing Dawn and calling her Dee Dee, Pikari (ピカリ), a nickname he came up with one day after she got shocked by the classes Plusle and Minun which caused her hair to go all frizzly and sparkle. "Pikapika" is an onomatopoeia for "sparkling" and she was given the nickname by him. After obtaining the 5 required ribbons, he participated in the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort. Unfortunately he was unable to advance past the Appeal round as his Empoleon`s Luster Cannon proved to be too powerful for his Floatzel to defend.

character.name: Pottaishi (Kengo)
character.description: Prinplup is Kenny`s main and starter Pokémon.

character.name: Foodin (Kengo)
character.description: Kenny`s Alakazam was first seen during the Coordinator appeal stage of the Floaroma Pokémon Contest.

character.name: Mai Francois Joy
character.description: Paige is one of the daughters of the Nurse Joy who live near the Valley Windworks.

character.name: Sayaka Francois Joy
character.description: Marnie is one of the daughters of the Nurse Joy who live near the Valley Windworks.

character.name: Fuwante (Sayaka Francois Joy to Mai Francois Joy)
character.description: Marnie has three Drifloon and Paige has one.

character.name: Kazuo
character.description: Karsten is the husband of a Nurse Joy, the father of Marnie and Paige. He works at the Valley Windworks.

character.name: Denryu (Kazuo)
character.description: Karsten`s Ampharos works with him at the Valley Windworks.

character.name: Manmoo (Hikari)
character.description: Mamoswine evolve after being attacked by Team Rocket.

character.name: Yuuka
character.description: Rhonda is one of the reporters and hosts of the television program Sinnoh Now.

character.name: Isaki
character.description: Ryan and Bryan are brothers that always battle together in double battles with their Quilava and Croconaw.

character.name: Isamu
character.description: Ryan and Bryan are brothers that always battle together in double battles with their Quilava and Croconaw.

character.name: Magmarashi (Isaki)
character.description: Quilava battled Ash and Dawn`s Turtwig and Piplup in two, two on two battles.

character.name: Alligates (Isamu)
character.description: Croconaw battled Ash and Dawn`s Turtwig and Piplup in two, two on two battles.

character.name: Sinnoh Now Cameraman 2
character.description: This is the second Sinnoh Now camera crew that Ash and his friends encountered in Sinnoh. The crew seems to be lead by http://anidb.net/ch24233 [Rhonda]. In episode 44 (in the dub) the microphone carrier is called Jack. He keeps banging the microphone against Rhonda`s head.

character.name: Momi
character.description: Cheryl is one of five trainers who can join with the main character during an event in Pokémon Diamond and Pearl for the Nintendo DS. Cheryl first appeared in Eterna Forest.

character.name: Lucky (Momi)
character.description: Cheryl`s Chansey is good at using restoration techniques.

character.name: Minomucchi (Momi)
character.description: Burmy was lured to a Tree which Cheryl put Honey on and she later captured it.

character.name: Garmeil (Momi)
character.description: Cheryl was trying to get Burmy to evolve, but Burmy lost all of its battles. He then got stolen by Team Rocket and when battling against Team Rocket, Burmy evolved.

character.name: Minomadam (Momi)
character.description: Cheryl has all three types: a Plant Cloak, a Sandy Cloak and a Trash Cloak Wormadam.

character.name: Natane
character.description: Gardenia is the Gym Leader of the Eterna Gym.

character.name: Cherinbo (Natane)
character.description: Gardenia sent out Cherubi as the first Pokemon she used to battle Ash in the Eterna Forest.

character.name: Naetle (Natane)
character.description: Ash first battled Gardenia`s Turtwig with his Turtwig in the Eterna Forest. Gardenia`s Turtwig proved to be very fast and very powerful.

character.name: Konohana (Youko)
character.description: Yoko`s Nuzleaf delivered a message to Gardenia while in the Eterna Forest. Gardenia left with Nuzleaf.

character.name: Tsuribito
character.description: In the Sinnoh region, a Fisherman came running with his Zigzagoon that was K.O`d by the Buoysel that Ash and Dawn eventually caught.

character.name: Goyou
character.description: Lucian is a member of the Sinnoh Elite Four. Lucian made his anime debut with his Girafarig on television using his Girafarig against a Trainer`s Scizor. Then he appeared at the same Pokémon Center that Ash, Brock and Dawn were at and was challenged to a battle by Dawn`s Buizel. Buizel quickly lost, due to it not obeying Dawn`s commands. When Buizel was caged by Team Rocket, he helped it regain its confidence and it broke the cage. He then battled Team Rocket using Buizel for a brief moment. Lucian won the battle with Buizel and realizes it wants a rematch. This time, with Buizel listening to Dawn`s orders, Lucian interrupts the battle and says it`s better this time.

character.name: Kirinriki (Goyou)
character.description: It was seen battling against a Trainer`s Scizor on TV. It dodged some attacks and finished the battle using Psybeam.

character.name: Dohtakun (Goyou)
character.description: Bronzong was used by Lucian when battling Dawn and her Buizel. It quickly won the match because Buizel didn`t listen to Dawn`s commands.

character.name: Ginga-dan Grunt
character.description: Team Galactic grunts try to entice Pokémon to do their bidding, attempt to invite the region`s Pokémon professor to do research for them and steal people`s Pokémon.

character.name: Skunpuu (Junsaa)
character.description: Eterna City Officer Jenny`s Stunky.

character.name: Kimawari (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando`s Sunflora was accused of stealing, but it was later discovered that Meowth was disguised as a Sunflora.

character.name: Inomoo (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn`s Piloswine evolved into Dawn`s Mamoswine after being attacked by Team Rocket.

character.name: Kouin
character.description: This Miner warns Ash, Brock and Dawn from going into the Forest Manor as the building`s power is out and there is a strange ghost lurking around inside. He exeggerates his description of the happenings inside the Manor, which scare Ash, Brock and Dawn even further.

character.name: Youko
character.description: Youko is Gardenia`s assistant.

character.name: Chika Ojisan
character.description: In Pokemon Diamond and Pearl, the Underground Man lives in Eterna City in a house next door to the Pokémon Center. In the video games, he is the father of Byron and grandfather of Roark, though that distinction has not been made in the anime.

character.name: Roserade (Natane)
character.description: Roserade beat Ash`s Turtwig but it was defeated later in the Gym battle by Ash`s Aipom.

character.name: Roushinshi
character.description: The old man is the owner of the Wailord-shaped boat. The boat leaves, the old man uses his Mantine to help rescue the Pokémon that were stuck on the boat and from the boat hitting a rock.

character.name: Mantain (Roushinshi)
character.description: The Old Man`s Mantine took Ash and Dawn to the Wailord shaped boat that their Pokemon were trapped on. It then rescued them by destroying a rock in the path of the boat.

character.name: Shirona
character.description: Cynthia is a Pokémon master and an Elite Four Champion.

character.name: Gablias (Shirona)
character.description: Cynthia`s Garchomp was first seen battling Lucian`s Bronzong on TV.

character.name: Manyula (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Weavile made its first appearance battling against Cynthia`s Garchomp.

character.name: Yamikarasu (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Murkrow first apperance was in battle against Cynthia and her Garchomp.

character.name: Dodaitose (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Torterra is his strongest Pokémon. Torterra made its first appearance in a battle against Cynthia`s Garchomp.

character.name: Jun

character.name: Emperte (Jun)
character.description: Jun`s Empoleon is his main Pokémon.

character.name: Heracros (Jun)
character.description: Jun`s Heracross was first seen on Iron Island training with Jun`s Empoleon.

character.name: Gen

character.name: Lucario (Gen)
character.description: Lucario is Riley`s main Pokemon.

character.name: Bunyat (Mars)
character.description: Mars`s Purugly is one of her main Pokemon.

character.name: Mukuhawk (Jun)
character.description: Jun`s Staraptor was first seen during a three on three battle with Ash.

character.name: Roserade (Jun)
character.description: Jun`s Roserade was first seen during a three on three battle with Ash.

character.name: Marina
character.description: Marina is a Trainer from New Bark Town that appeared in the The Legend of Thunder! special.

character.name: Ordile (Marina)
character.description: Zoey showed a video of Marina on her laptop that indicated that Marina`s Feraligatr had evolved.

character.name: Purin (Marina)
character.description: Marina`s Jigglypuff seems to enter double contests with her other Pokemon.

character.name: Karanakushi (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Shellos was first introduced to Dawn and friends the day Zoey injured her foot.

character.name: TV Enshutsuka
character.description: This person was created as an illusion by Mismagius.

character.name: Miru
character.description: Mira first appears on a dam near Hearthome City.

character.name: Casey (Miru)
character.description: Mira`s Abra teleported Ash and his friends to Hearthome City after they rescued Mira`s Sandshrew.

character.name: Sand (Miru)
character.description: Mira`s Sandshrew was caught underwater when the nearby dam flooded the town where Mira lived.

character.name: Korotok (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando`s Kricketune was introduced to Dawn and her friends just before the Pokémon Contest! Yosuga Convention!!

character.name: Kouhei
character.description: Conway`s first appearance was during the tag-team competition as Dawn`s partner. He later managed to get 8 badges in order to enter the Sinnoh League. In the third battling round, Conway battled against Ash. He proved to be a formidable opponent for Ash, but Ash`s Gible was able to defeat two of Conway`s Pokémon to give Ash the victory and allow him to advance the next round against Paul.

character.name: Yadoking (Kouhei)
character.description: Slowking first appeared along with Conway during the tag-team Tournament in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Honoka

character.name: Camome (Honoka)
character.description: Holly`s Wingull first appeared with Holly in the tag-team tournament.

character.name: Enta
character.description: The Tag-Team Judge officiated over the Sinnoh region Tag-Team Tournament that Ash and his friends all entered.

character.name: Tekkanin (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Ninjask was first seen in a flashback fighting. Paul`s Ninjask battled against Ash`s Infernape during the quarter-final round of the Sinnoh League. Infernape was able endure Giga Drain and managed to hit it with a Mach Punch to K.O. it.

character.name: Yuusuke
character.description: Jaco was a student at training camp for Electric-type Pokémon where he was trying to train an Electrike.

character.name: Pokemon Kunren Center no Shochou

character.name: Rakurai (Pokemon Kunren Center no Shochou)
character.description: Cal`s Electrike was used to demonstrate hitting the targets at the training camp.

character.name: Rakurai (Yuusuke)
character.description: Jaco`s Electrike had problems targeting its attacks, so Jaco took it to a training camp to improve its skills.

character.name: Livolt (Yuusuke)
character.description: Jaco`s Manectric evolved when it was battling against Meowth and Jessie.

character.name: Bossgodora (Kouhei)

character.name: Nosepass (Honoka)

character.name: Eleboo (Shinji)
character.description: Elekid evolved into Electabuzz during a tag battle where it was fighting alongside Ash`s Chimchar against Dawn`s Buizel and Conway`s Heracross.

character.name: Kamonegi (Honoka)
character.description: Holly`s Farfetch`d battled with Brock`s Croagunk against Dawn and Conway in the Sinnoh tag-team tournament.

character.name: Heracros (Kouhei)
character.description: Conway`s Heracross was first seen battling in the tag-team tournament.

character.name: Obaba
character.description: The Old Woman told Ash and his friends the tale of Spiritomb and how the Aura Guardian sealed him away.

character.name: Isis

character.name: Meijin

character.name: Sekkeishi
character.description: When Isis fails to build the bridge in time, he tried to make the bridge himself with his own Pokémon.

character.name: Beadull (Meijin)
character.description: Bibarel is currently in the care of Isis as her previous job was building a bridge.

character.name: Karashina-hakase
character.description: Professor Carolina is the grandmother of Cynthia and she is the curator of Celestic Town Museum.

character.name: Reiji

character.name: Mukuhawk (Reiji)
character.description: Reggie`s Staraptor was first introduced when Ash and Reggie battled outside Reggie`s house.

character.name: Atsuo
character.description: Alan met Ash and friends while they were at Mt. Coronet.

character.name: Nosepass (Atsuo)
character.description: Alan`s Nosepass evolved into Probopass during the time Ash and his friends were with Alan near Mt. Coronet.

character.name: Dainose (Atsuo)
character.description: Alan`s Nosepass evolved into Probopass during the time Ash and his friends were with Alan near Mt. Coronet.

character.name: Marble

character.name: Matthew

character.name: Rentorar (Marble)
character.description: Marble`s Luxray has been raised since it was a Luxio.

character.name: Kinogassa (Kengo)
character.description: Kenny`s Breloom entered the Solaceon Town Contest.

character.description: Dawn was being attacked by a group of Unown and Aipom jumped in front of Dawn to protect her and evolved into Ambipom. Dawn gave Ambipom to O at the end of episode 124, to train it in Pokémon Ping-pong.

character.name: Dohmirror (Saturn)
character.description: Saturn sent out his Bronzor to use Flash to guide them through the ruins.

character.name: Aki
character.description: Autumn is one of the Maid Café sisters.

character.description: Summer is one of the sisters who work at the Maid Café.

character.name: Haru

character.name: Miltank (Aki)
character.description: With Brock`s help, Autumn`s Miltank began to behave better and listen to Autumn`s commands.

character.name: Otaku
character.description: The Nerdy Customers visited the Milk Cafe`s. One of them seemed to be a big fan of Marina who also wore a bandanna similar to May`s.

character.name: Yumomi

character.name: Urimoo (Yumomi)

character.name: Leona`s Parents

character.name: Glion (Shinji)

character.name: Lucario (Sumomo)

character.name: Beadull (Reiji)

character.name: Marunoom (Reiji)

character.name: Donkarasu (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Honchkrow was first seen in a flashback battling against Maylene`s Meditite and Machoke.

character.name: Dokurog (Saturn)
