character.name: Shizue
character.description: Francesca is a Pokémon Magician.

character.name: Lisyan (Shizue)
character.description: Francesca performs magic tricks with her three Chingling.

character.name: Poppo (Shizue)
character.description: Francesca performs magic tricks with her Pidgey.

character.name: Hajime
character.description: Kellyn is a Pokémon Ranger from the Fiore region but transferred to Almia when he was 10. From there, he went to the Almia ranger school. Kellyn rarely likes to work with people and will only if he sees a connection between the person and the Pokémon he is saving or if he is forced to. Being known as the "Genius Ranger", he can operate as an operator, ranger and mechanic. He is a bit of a neat freak when it comes to his collection of items at home. His memory is vivid and strong, as he can recite all of Almia`s times in order. When in Sinnoh, he and Solana were to find the a lost Riolu from the Lucario Kingdom. Kellyn went to find him, while Solana and Officer Jenny looked for Pokémon Hunter J. At first, Kellyn thought that having Ash and company would ruin the mission but after he saw their intentions, he let them travel with him. When Riolu was safely home, Kellyn supposedly went to the Hoenn region to work full time in stopping Kyogre and Groudon`s fighting from reoccurring.

character.name: Riolu
character.description: Riolu is part of a Royal Family.

character.name: Riolu no Sewanin
character.description: Riolu`s Caretaker is an old man that has been entrusted with the Royal Family`s Riolu.

character.name: J no Client
character.description: J`s Client wanted to get the Royal Family`s Riolu.

character.name: Onidrill (J no Client)
character.description: J`s Client`s Fearow was used to help him escape the battle.

character.name: Bossgodora (J no Client)

character.name: J no Client no Kyouhansha

character.name: Crobat (J no Kyouhansha)
character.description: J`s Henchmen`s Crobat attacked Ash and friends while trying to rescue Riolu.

character.name: Samehader (J no Kyouhansha)
character.description: J`s Henchmen`s Sharpedo attacked Ash and his friends while they were on the boat.

character.name: Taiki
character.description: Austin first encountered Jessie at a lake after her Dustox followed his Dustox.

character.name: Dokucale (Taiki)
character.description: Dustox went to a lake where it met Jessie`s Dustox.

character.name: Taiki ni no Shounen
character.description: Astin was Jessie`s childhood crush.

character.name: Raichuu (Shou)
character.description: Sho`s Raichu battled against Ash`s Pikachu twice.

character.name: Pichu (Shou)
character.description: Sho`s Pichu met Piplup and Pikachu in a forest.

character.name: Mikuri
character.description: Wallace is a Contest Master.

character.name: Milokaross (Mikuri)
character.description: Milotic helped Wallace make his amazing entrance to the Wallace Cup in the Sinnoh region.

character.name: Glacia (Haruka)
character.description: May explained that her Eevee had evolved into a Glaceon by coming into contact with the Ice Rock near Snowpoint City.

character.name: Chiaki
character.description: Roman battled Ash, Brock, Dawn and May in the Seven Stars Restaurant.

character.name: Chinatsu
character.description: Kylie battled Ash, Brock, Dawn and May in the Seven Stars Restaurant.

character.name: Kabigon (Chiaki)
character.description: Roman`s Snorlax battled against Ash and Brock.

character.name: Kirinriki (Chiaki)
character.description: Roman`s Girafarig battled against Dawn and May.

character.name: Fuwante (Chinatsu)
character.description: Kylie`s Drifloon battled against Dawn and May.

character.name: Gonbe (Chinatsu)
character.description: Kylie`s Munchlax battled against Ash and Brock.

character.name: Seven Star Restaurant Chef
character.description: Seven Star Restaurant Chef.

character.name: Seven Star Restaurant Butler
character.description: Seven Star Restaurant Butler.

character.name: Roserade (Shuu)
character.description: May revealed in a flashback that Roselia accompanied Drew to Johto and had evolved.

character.name: Kaito
character.description: Kyle is a Pokémon Coordinator that appeared in the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Kameil (Haruka)
character.description: Squirtle evolved into Wartortle sometime before the beginning of the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Parshen (Kaito)
character.description: Kyle`s Cloyster was seen during the first stage of the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Keikouo (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Finneon was first seen during the first round of the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Lantern (Kaito)
character.description: Kyle`s Lanturn appeared in the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Shizariger (Kaito)
character.description: Kyle`s Crawdaunt appeared in the Wallace Cup in a battle against Dawn.

character.name: Fushigibana (Haruka)
character.description: May`s Venusaur was seen defeating a Marill for May in the second battle round of the Wallace Cup.

character.name: Taisei
character.description: Tyler has just begun his journey as a Pokémon Trainer.

character.name: Pochama (Taisei)
character.description: Tyler`s Piplup (Pippy) is his starter Pokemon.

character.name: Yanyanma (Taisei)
character.description: Tyler`s Yanma was the second Yanma he attempted to capture. The first Yanma he attempted to capture was `stolen` by Jessie.

character.name: Maximum Kamen
character.description: Crasher Wake is the Gym Leader of the Pastoria Gym.

character.name: Hiroki
character.description: Hiroki is likely based off a character named Hiroshi from Dokonjou Gaeru.

character.name: Gurekichi
character.description: Hamilton`s Croagunk is a previous winner of the Gureggru Festival of the Nomose Great Marsh.

character.name: Muski
character.description: Carny is the station chief in Pastoria City.

character.name: Gureggru (Joy)
character.description: Nurse Joy`s Croagunk, also known as Chrissy, won the Gureggru Festival of the Nomose Great Marsh while Ash and his friends were there.

character.name: Floazel (Maximum Kamen)
character.description: Crasher Wake`s Floatzel was introduced right after Ash`s Buizel got into a fight with Pikachu.

character.name: Gyarados (Maximum Kamen)
character.description: Crasher Wake`s Gyarados was the first Pokemon he sent out against Ash during his Gym Battle.

character.name: Nuoh (Maximum Kamen)
character.description: Crasher Wake`s Quagsire was the second Pokemon he sent out to battle against Ash during his Gym Battle.

character.name: Urimoo (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn`s Swinub first appeared at Mr. Backlot`s mansion. It caused trouble by devouring all of Dawn`s Poffins, which made her Pokemon very angry.

character.name: Urayama
character.description: Mr. Backlot is the owner of a large Mansion.

character.name: Monica
character.description: Monica is the caretaker at Mr. Backlot`s mansion.

character.name: Paris
character.description: Paris was one of the judges in the Hearthome Collection show.

character.name: Hoshino
character.description: Hermione is Paris` teacher and one of the judges in the Hearthome Collection show.

character.name: Chouko
character.description: Cocoa is a Pokémon stylist. She entered the Hearthome Collection contest along with Dawn and Ash.

character.name: Mumage (Chouko)
character.description: Cocoa`s Mismagius was seen in the Hearthome Collection contest.

character.name: Mimilop (Paris)
character.description: Paris`s Lopunny was first seen exiting the car with her.

character.name: Aoi
character.description: Angie first appeared at the Pokemon Summer School.

character.name: Mitsuki
character.description: Mitchell is one of the students that attended Professor Rowan`s Pokémon Summer School.

character.name: Kensuke
character.description: Kendall is one of the students that attended Professor Rowan`s Pokémon Summer School.

character.name: Kolink (Aoi)
character.description: Angie`s Shinx was first seen at the Pokemon Summer School.

character.name: Yuurei Moji
character.description: The girl was a ghost and Dusknoir was trying to stop her.

character.name: Melissa
character.description: Fantina is the Gym Leader of the Hearthome Gym.

character.name: Fuwaride (Melissa)
character.description: Fantina`s Drifblim evolved during a battle with Ash.

character.name: Fuwante (Melissa)
character.description: Fantina`s Drifloon evolved into Drifblim during a battle with Ash.

character.name: Gangar (Melissa)
character.description: Fantina`s Gengar was first seen in a flashback of a previous Gym Battle.

character.name: Muuma (Melissa)
character.description: Fantina`s Misdreavus evolved during a Contest Battle.

character.name: Mumage (Melissa)
character.description: Fantina`s Mismagius evolved during a Contest Battle.

character.name: Yuri
character.description: Lila is Johanna`s old rival. She also owns a clothing shop in Celestic Town.

character.name: Cherrim (Yuri)
character.description: Lila`s Cherrim was see during a Pokemon Contest that Yuri entered.

character.name: Enekororo (Yuri)
character.description: Lila`s Delcatty battled against Dawn in the Celestic Town Contest.

character.name: Skutank (Jupiter)
character.description: Jupiter`s Skuntank was seen sleeping as during the Museum raid.

character.name: Toritodon (Shirona)
character.description: Cynthia`s Gastrodon was first seen battling against Team Galaxy at the Celestic Ruins.

character.name: Dohmirror (Mars)
character.description: Mars`s Bronzor first appeared at the Celestic Ruins.

character.name: Angie`s Parents
character.description: Angie`s Parents were away on a trip and left their daughter alone.

character.name: Tsuribito
character.description: The Fisherman in Solaceon Town began spreading rumors of a weird looking beast floating around the town.

character.name: America no Trainer
character.description: The American Trainer left his Lickitung in Angie`s care, but it evolved into Lickilicky while he was gone.

character.name: Berobelt (America no Trainer)
character.description: American Trainer`s Lickilicky evolved while in the care of Angie.

character.name: Beroringa (America no Trainer)
character.description: American Trainer`s Lickitung was left with Angie.

character.name: Ryou
character.description: Aaron is a member of the Sinnoh Elite Four.

character.name: Beequeen (Ryou)
character.description: Aaron`s Vespiquen was first seen in a public event held by Aaron.

character.name: Ooba
character.description: Flint is a master Fire-type trainer and member of the Sinnoh Elite Four. He first encounter Ash and his friends in Sunyshore City outside the Sunyshore Gym when Ash was captured by the autodefence hands. He sent out his Infernape to rescue Ash. After his friend and rival Volkner wasn`t willing to participate in a battle for a gym badge with Ash, Flint agreed to battle Ash hoping it would motivate Volkner again. Flint defeated Ash in a battle at the Sunyshore Gym which featured his Infernape verses Ash`s Infernape, Buizel and Pikachu.

character.name: Kikuno
character.description: Bertha is a master Ground-type Trainer and member of the Sinnou Elite Four. While on their way to the Grand Festival at the Lake Side Resort, Ash and his friends encountered Bertha and Brock recognized her almost immediately. She took him aside and told him not to reveal her identity to anyone else but Brock found it hard to and eventually told his friends who she was by accident. Bertha observed Ash and his friends as the tracked down Team Rocket and recovered Youshichi`s Magby. After Team Rocket was disposed of and were sent flying away, Ash asked Bertha for a battle which she agreed to. She sent out her Hippowdon to battle against Ash`s Torterra. After a fierce battle between the two, Hippowdon was victorious.

character.name: Dorapion (Ryou)
character.description: Aaron`s Drapion was first seen at a public event held by Aaron.

character.name: Scorpi (Ryou)
character.description: Aaron`s Skorupi was first seen at a public event held by Aaron.

character.name: Agehunt (Ryou)
character.description: Aaron`s Wurmple was the first Pokémon he obtained when he was a child.

character.name: Kemusso (Ryou)
character.description: Aaron`s Wurmple was seen in a flashback being left behind near a tree.

character.name: Jitsugyouka
character.description: The Businessman explained to Ash, Brock and Dawn that a bunch of Wailord`s were blocking the path for any boats to leave.

character.name: Phione Salesman
character.description: The Phione Salesman sold products based on Phione in Akebi Town.

character.name: Urara
character.description: Ursula is a rival of Dawn`s that was first introduced at the Akebi Town Pokémon Contest Tournament but it was revealed later on that she participated in the Mikuri Cup at the Lakeside Resort, the tournament Dawn won. Ursula is a Pokémon Coordinator who`s goal was to defeat Dawn at the Grand Festival. After obtaining the 5 necessary ribbons in order to quality for the event, she managed to advanced past the Appeal round at the Grand Festival and eventually was matched up against Dawn.

character.name: Minomadam (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Wormadam was first seen during the Akabi Pokemon Contest`s first round. It created a sand barrier around itself which was enough to allow Urara to continue on to the next round of the tournament.

character.name: Gabite (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Gabite was first seen outside as it smooched Dawn`s poffin that Pachirisu was about to eat. It was revealed later in a flashback scene that it was also in the background during the Mikuri Cup but was not actually seen in the actual episode.

character.name: Perap (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Chatot helped her capture a criminal one day while on a stakeout and since that day it has stayed with her as her partner. When Rocket Gang attempted to capture Pikachu, they accidentally captured her Chatot.

character.name: Keisatsu Shochou
character.description: The Akabi Town Superintendent is the head of the Police force for the area.

character.name: Guntou
character.description: Ash and friends as well as the Wild Officer Jenny were at a shop across the street when Robbers ran out of a store in Akebi Town.

character.name: Mitsuryousha
character.description: The Poacher was attempting to capture Snorunt as it was on his list of valuable Pokemon to capture.

character.name: Onigohri (Mitsuryousha)
character.description: Poacher`s Glalie is a powerful Pokemon that found the missing Snorunt and it tried to get away with it. Ash and his friends as well as Team Rocket managed to stop it and caged it and its master up for Officer Jenny to come get them.

character.name: Yuusaku
character.description: Christopher runs a chain of Ramen shops across the Sinnoh Region. Before he began his Ramen shops, he befriended Jessie and James at Team Rocket recruiting. Jessie and James shared their Ramen with him and he was grateful for their help.

character.name: Port
character.description: Provo was champion of the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town the year before Ash won it.

character.name: Kairyu (Port)
character.description: Provo`s Dragonite participated in the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town against Paul`s Honchkrow.

character.name: Mukuhawk (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Staraptor evolved during the PokéRinger competition held in Wind Town.

character.name: Sanpei
character.description: Steveland battled against James in the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town.

character.name: Popocco (Sanpei)
character.description: Steveland`s Skiploom battled against James in the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town.

character.name: Tetsuo
character.description: Taylor was Ash`s first opponent in the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town.

character.name: Airmd (Tetsuo)
character.description: Tetsuo`s Skarmory was Ash`s first opponent in the PokéRinger competition in Wind Town.

character.name: Suzuna
character.description: Candice is the Gym Leader of the Snowpoint Gym. Candice attended Zoey`s contest in Mecabbage Town, where she was joined by Ash, Dawn and Brock who were also there for the same reason. Her cheering encouraged Zoey to do her best in the last battle of the Mecabbage Town Pokémon Contest, where Zoey`s Glameow was facing a Shuckle with powerful defenses. After winning the battle and earning her fifth ribbon, Zoey thanked Candice for her encouragement. She later threw a big party to celebrate Zoey`s victory. The day after the contest, Candice and Zoey helped Dawn to come up with a new contest combination that could be used as a finishing move for a double contest battle. She gave Dawn an idea on how to use her Mamoswine`s Ice Shard attack more effectively by demonstrating a beautiful Ice Shard and Razor Leaf combination using her Abomasnow.

character.name: Charem (Suzuna)
character.description: Candice`s Medicham battled against Ash during his gym battle.

character.name: Yukinooh (Suzuna)
character.description: Candice`s Abomasnow battled against Ash during his gym battle. Abomasnow was also used by Candice when she wanted to show Dawn a more effective way of utilizing her Mamoswine`s Ice Shard to create a contest combination. In Candice`s demonstration, it combined its Ice Shard and Razor Leaf attacks to create a breeze containing ice fragments around her, thus showing how Ice Shard can be used to create a combination without freezing the partner Pokémon.

character.name: Nyula (Suzuna)
character.description: Candice`s Sneasel battled against Ash during his gym battle.

character.name: Goriky (Kengo)
character.description: Kenny`s Machoke was first seen during the entry round of the Tatsunami Tournament!!

character.name: Ou
character.description: O entered the Pokémon Ping Pong Tournament in Tatsunami Town where he met Dawn and her Ambipom. After a fierce finals between the two, O invited Dawn`s Ambipom to train in his Ping Pong Center in Vermilion City. Dawn let her Ambipom decide if it wished to continue doing contests with her or pursue Ping Pong under O`s supervision.

character.name: Dirteng (Ou)
character.description: O`s Shiftry competed in the Tatsunami Town Pokémon Ping Pong Tournament.

character.name: Shinpan
character.description: The Ping Pong Referees watched the matches at the Tatsunami Town Pokémon Ping Pong Tournament.

character.name: Pokemon Ping-pong Taikai no Announcer
character.description: The Ping Pong Tournament Announcer conducted all the over-the-air commentary of all the matches.

character.name: Hakase
character.description: The Professor participated in the Pokémon Ping Pong Tournament in Tatsunami Town.

character.name: Foodin (Hakase)
character.description: The Professor`s Alakazam participated in the Pokémon Ping Pong Tournament in Tatsunami Town.

character.name: Marilyn
character.description: Marilyn is a Pokémon Trainer that likes cute Pokémon.

character.name: Cherinbo (Marilyn)
character.description: Marilyn`s Cherubi battled against Dawn`s Bunnery.

character.name: Lisyan (Marilyn)
character.description: Marilyn`s Chingling battled against Brock.

character.name: Shellder (Marilyn)
character.description: Marilyn`s Shellder was sent out to battle Brock.

character.name: Ubukata
character.description: Ubukata was a student in Suzuna`s class at the Trainers` School in Snowpoint City. Ubukata previously worked as a salesman selling Pokétch watches.

character.name: Skutank (Ubukata)
character.description: Ubukata`s Skuntank attempted to stop Team Rocket from stealing the Pokeballs from the Trainers` School.

character.name: Ooishi
character.description: While Nozomi was young and attending the Kissaki City Trainers` School, she found an abandoned Nyarmar in a box in an alley. Nozomi kept the Nyarmar in the school`s shed where it was also cared for by Suzuna. Teacher Ooishi found out about it pretty quickly but relented and allowed Suzuna and Nozocchi to take care of Nyarmar.

character.name: Yukikaburi (Suzuna)
character.description: Candice`s Snover was the third Pokemon that was sent out to face Ash during his Gym Battle at the Snowpoint Gym.

character.name: Dodorio (Suzuna)
character.description: Candice`s Dodrio was first seen taking her to the landing site of the Battle Pyramid after it landed just outside of Snowpoint City in the Sinnoh region. It then took Candice and Zoey back to Snowpoint City after they watched Brandon and Paul`s battle.

character.name: Mikoto
character.description: Mikoto is a Kissaki Temple guardian. She first appeared just after the Battle Pyramid landed outside of Kissaki City.

character.name: Hariteyama (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Hariyama battled against Brandon`s Regirock. It didn`t last very long in battle as it was quickly overpowered by Regirock.

character.name: Kodora (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Larion was first seen during a battle against Brandon`s Regice. It was quickly frozen and defeated easily by Brandon`s Regice.

character.name: Nidoking (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Nidoking was sent out to battle against Brandon`s Registeel but was quickly defeated.

character.name: Naetle (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Turtwig was seen in a flashback as Paul recalled the events that took place between his brother Reggie and Battle Pyramid King Brandon.

character.name: Dorapion (Reiji)
character.description: Reggie`s Drapion battled against Brandon`s Regirock but was defeated.

character.name: Handsome
character.description: Ash and his friends first met Looker on the Denryu Train on route to Lake Acuity. He had too many boxed lunches which he dropped while walking by Ash and friends. Disguised as a Team Galactic member, together with Team Rocket, he ambushed the grunts that were guarding the entrance to Spear Pillar. After assuming their places, he managed to establish a contact with champion Cynthia and let her know of Team Galactic`s actions. While waiting for her, he was able to discover who was the evil team`s boss when Cyrus arrived at the site along with the commanders. However, they immediately saw through their disguises and consequently, he and Team Rocket were taken prisoners. He was later rescued by Cynthia, and was left keeping watch over Jupiter and some of Team Galactic`s members that were kept captive, while she, along with Ash and his friends, followed Cyrus and the commanders to Spear Pillar. After the evil team`s plan had been thwarted, it was shown that he wondered where Team Rocket left off to, as they had mysteriously disappeared.

character.name: Untenshi
character.description: The Train Engineer drove the Denryu train that Ash and his friends were traveling on while heading to Lake Acuity.

character.name: Shashou
character.description: The Train Conductor went to go check the train tracks with Looker to see what the problem was.

character.name: Denryu (Untenshi)
character.description: The Train Engineer`s Ampharos powered the train that Ash and his friends were traveling on while on route to Lake Acuity. It later rescued Pikachu from Team Rocket before getting separated from everyone else.

character.name: Osabaki
character.description: Osabaki was the match referee for Ash and Paul`s battle at Lake Acuity. Paul`s brother asked him to serve as the judge for the Pokémon Battle. Since Team Rocket ripped up the Pokemon Center`s battlefield, he agreed to referee the match on an open plain next to Lake Acuity. Osabaki was unaware that Team Rocket was behind the `repairs` of the Pokemon Center`s battlefield and that they were his assistants for the match due to their clever disguises.

character.name: Booburn (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Magmortar battled against Pikachu during a full battle match at Lake Acuity. It evolved into a Magmortar in between encounters with Ash. It`s strength and Flame Body proved to be very effective against Pikachu during the match at Lake Acuity which required Ash to withdraw Pikachu from the battle.

character.name: Moukazaru (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Monferno evolved during a full battle against Paul just after it defeated Paul`s Ursaring. Having grown in strength and power due to its evolution, it quickly showed everyone that it was a very formidable opponent. It learned Mach Punch right after its evolution from a Chimchar.

character.name: Konoha
character.description: Konoha watches over a forest near Suiren Town. She warned Ash and Brock about a Mojumbo that would absorb the power of their Pokémon, especially ones with a large body. Konoha went with Ash and Brock looking for Dawn and her Manmoo which were somewhere in the forest. When she found them, she saw Mojumbo near a big tree. She explained that the tree is precious and protects the forest. Konoha asked Mojumbo if she could help heal the tree which had been split in half by lightning. She instructed the Pokémon to use Focus Growth on the spot where the nutrients flow though the tree. After the tree was healed, Mojumbo agreed to help protect the forest with Konoha.

character.name: Atsuki
character.description: Atsuki and his partner Chishio pretended to be participants of the fake Pokémon Hustle event that was created by Team Rocket. Team Rocket`s plan was to steal the Poke balls but they were stolen by Atsuki and Chishio before they could complete their plan. Team Rocket eventually found out that the Poke balls were stolen but Officer Jenny was already following Atsuki and Chishio undercover when she attempted to capture them. Jessie, James and Meowth thought Atsuki and Chishio were members of Team Rocket as well and helped them with their escape. After Atsuki and Chishio told them they had never even heard of Team Rocket, Jessie, James and Meowth got mad at them and tried to recover the Poke balls. Atsuki and Chishio were later captured and arrested by Officer Jenny with the help of Ash and his friends.

character.name: Chishio
character.description: Chishio and her partner Atsuki pretended to be participants of the fake Pokémon Hustle event that was created by Team Rocket. Team Rocket`s plan was to steal the Poke balls but they were stolen by Atsuki and Chishio before they could complete their plan. Team Rocket eventually found out that the Poke balls were stolen but Officer Jenny was already following Atsuki and Chishio undercover when she attempted to capture them. Jessie, James and Meowth thought Atsuki and Chishio were members of Team Rocket as well and helped them with their escape. After Atsuki and Chishio told them they had never even heard of Team Rocket, Jessie, James and Meowth got mad at them and tried to recover the Poké balls. Atsuki and Chishio were later captured and arrested by Officer Jenny with the help of Ash and his friends.

character.name: Zangoose (Chishio)
character.description: Chishio`s Zangoose participated in the fake Pokémon Hustle event that Team Rocket put on. After stealing the Poke balls, Zangoose was sent out to protect Chishio from Meowth who attempted to recover the `stolen` Pokemon. Zangoose`s X-Scissor quickly defeated Meowth but stalled Chishio and Atsuki long enough for Officer Jenny and Ash to intercept them. Zangoose was then defeated by Pikachu.

character.name: Sleep (Atsuki)
character.description: Atsuki`s Drowzee participated in the fake Pokémon Hustle event that Team Rocket put on. After stealing the Poke balls, Drowzee was sent out to protect Atsuki from Meowth who attempted to recover the `stolen` Pokemon. Zangoose`s X-Scissor quickly defeated Meowth but stalled Chishio and Atsuki long enough for Officer Jenny and Ash to intercept them. Officer Jenny Growlithe was easily able to defeat Atsuki`s Drowzee.

character.name: Lulu
character.description: Lulu helps her parents runs a berry farm near Suiren Town in the Sinnoh region. The day Ash and his friends visited the farm, Lulu`s papa and mama were out buying new berry seeds and weren`t going to return for two or three days. Lulu invited Ash and his friends to stay the night at her house. Dawn`s Pochama found Lulu`s Maril attractive and tried to impress it until a wild Elekid intervened. Maril was captured by Team Rocket as they were spotted by Maril attempting to steal berries from the farm. Pochama and the wild Elekid managed to help rescue Maril from Team Rocket.

character.name: Maril (Lulu)
character.description: Lulu`s Marill helps Lulu run a berry farm near Suiren Town in the Sinnoh region. Dawn`s Pochama found Lulu`s Marill attractive and tried to impress it until a wild Elekid intervened. Marill was captured by Team Rocket as they were spotted by Marill attempting to steal berries from the farm. Pochama and the wild Elekid managed to help rescue Marill from Team Rocket. As Dawn was leaving, her Pochama got advice from Brock telling it to be strong as it could see that Elekid and Marill were becoming closer friends.

character.name: Kimawari (Lulu)
character.description: Lulu`s Sunflora helps Lulu runs a berry farm near Suiren Town in the Sinnoh region. Lulu has quite a few Sunflora and they all help her by wearing watering cans on their back to water all the berries on the farm. Team Rocket`s Meowth dressed up as one of the Sunflora in an attempt to steal some of the berries. Lulu fell for it as it was dark and they were able to put their plan in motion.

character.name: Oyakata
character.description: The Master conspired with Rocket Gang in Futaba Town to undermine some of the events that were happening there.

character.name: Iino Iizoo
character.description: Izzy lives with his wife Cara in Futaba Town and they are Dawn`s neighbors. He mistakenly thought James was Professor Samual Oak.

character.name: Iino Kane
character.description: Cara lives with her husband Izzy in Futaba Town and they are Dawn`s neighbors. She mistakenly thought James was Professor Samual Oak.

character.name: Tower Tycoon Kurotsugu
character.description: Tower Tycoon Palmer is the leader of the Battle Tower. He is also the father of Barry. Ash and his friends first met Palmer right after Barry ran into him just outside of Twinleaf Town.

character.name: Tosakinto Kyougisha
character.description: The Goldeen Contestant was challenged by James to see who could catch the most Goldeen from the tank. James was victorious as he had previous experience as a young boy fishing out Goldeen from the fountain at his house.

character.name: Blacky (Ayako)
character.description: Johanna`s Umbreon was first seen at Dawn`s house when Ash and his friends came to visit for the Twinleaf Town Festival. It battled alongside Johanna`s Glameow during a battle against Dawn.

character.name: Kairyu (Tower Tycoon Kurotsugu)
character.description: Palmer`s Dragonite was seen walking around the Twinleaf Town festival while Ash and his friends where there.

character.name: Dosidon (Tower Tycoon Kurotsugu)
character.description: Palmer`s Rhyperior battled in the Twinleaf Contest against Ash`s Grotle. It was able to defeat Grotle in a close battle.

character.name: Kotone
character.description: Lyra is a Pokémon trainer from the Johto region who first met Ash and his friends just after they resuced her Marill. Her Marill was stuck between two buildings and Ash`s Pikachu and Dawn`s Piplup rescued it just as Kotone arrived. Lyra was hosting a Johto Festa and invited Ash and his friends to check it out. After Team Rocket was defeated after trying to crash the Festa and steal Dawn`s egg, Lyra asked if she could travel with Ash.

character.name: Kazunari
character.description: Khoury traveled to the Sinnoh region with his father and Lyra to help run a MooMoo Milk exhibit at the Johto Festa. Khoury is friends with Lyra but he is a bit shy as Lyra`s overbearing personality seems to takeover when he tries to do anything.

character.name: Hinoarashi (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn received her Cyndaquil as an egg after she defeated Kotone in a battle during the Johto Festa in Suiren Town. Team Rocket noticed the egg while they were flying away and Meowth used his extender arm to capture the egg. While escaping from a wild Ursaring, James noticed that the egg was glowing, signifying that it was close to hatching. Dawn was able to recover the egg in time to watch it hatch. Dawn`s Cyndaquil didn`t get along with her Pilpup just after it hatched as they fought a lot.

character.name: Chicorita (Kotone)
character.description: Lyra`s Chikorita was first seen in a battle against Dawn`s Pilpup. Even though it had a type advantage, it was obvious that Dawn`s Pilpup was the superior Pokémon and Chikorita was easily defeated.

character.name: Kazunari no Chichiue
character.description: Kazunari`s Father came with his son and Kotone to the Sinnoh region to help with a Johto Festa that Kotone was putting on. He also ran a MooMoo Milk exhibit. Team Rocket stole a lot of the merchandise that he had and ate it. He agreed to let Kotone and his son travel with Ash and his friends after Kotone asked permission to do so.

character.name: Maril (Kotone)
character.description: Lyra`s Marill was stuck between two buildings and Ash`s Pikachu and Dawn`s Piplup rescued it just as Lyra arrived and introduced herself. Maril is Lyra`s main Pokémon and it helped rescue Dawn`s egg from Team Rocket with its powerful Water Gun. It also uses its Water Gun as a location tracker by shooting it high in the air for others to see.

character.name: Waninoko (Kazunari)
character.description: Khoury`s Totodile was first seen at the MooMoo Milk exhibit. It wasn`t eating its food, but Brock managed to use some berries to make it more appealing to Totodile.

character.name: Kirinriki (Kotone)
character.description: Lyra`s Girafarig was the third Pokémon that Ash and his friends saw. Lyra`s Girafarig was sent out to attempt to force the door open in the power plant, but it was unsuccessful in doing so.

character.name: Tanima no Hatsudensho no Juugyouin
character.description: The Valley Windworks Employee watches over the power plant from the control room. Ash and his friends visited him to see if they could find Kotone`s lost Marill. He called off the Magnemite that were chasing the group and helped them spot Marill on the monitor. Team Rocket later entered the room and he was back to sleep again. He tends to sleep on the job a lot and isn`t a very reliable employee. Perhaps he is just waiting for his pension to increase so he can retire.

character.name: Fukamaru (Kazunari)
character.description: Khoury and Ash both wanted to catch Gible after they saw how powerful and strong it was when it hurled a large rock at them during their first encounter in a forest near Suiren Town. Ash, Dawn, Khoury and Lyra all used fishing rods with Pokémon food as bait which Khoury had prepared. Eventually Khoury was able to capture it after it had a fortitude contest with Khoury`s Totodile which severely injured itself during the process weaking it.

character.name: Alligates (Kazunari)
character.description: Khoury`s Croconaw evolved during a tag battle against Ash and Dawn. It was battling with Lyra`s Chicorita when it evolved but was unable to win the match as Ash`s Monferno and Dawn`s Cyndaquil were able to defeat it.

character.name: Ruchiru
character.description: Rhyanna had a Pokemon battle with her younger brother in which she defeated his Murkrow fairly easily. He didn`t like the fact that he was defeated so easily and got mad at his sister. Rhyanna first encounter Ash and his friends as they were being affected by Murkrow and were seeing things in a forest just near the village that she lives in. They thought they were swimming until she snapped them out of it. Rhyanna explained that she was looking for a Dusk Stone and Brock decided that she would go with her to help her find it. With the help of her Misdreavus, Brock found the Dusk Stone under a large rock. Team Rocket showed up and tried to take the Dusk Stone and her Misdreavus. Brock`s Sudowoodo was unable to defeat the large mecha and it captured Rhyanna, Misdreavus and the Dusk Stone. It wasn`t until Mitchell arrived that she was rescued. The character`s Japanese name is taken from the character Tyltyl in Maurice Maeterlinck`s The Blue Bird, which her episode was heavily based on.

character.name: Muuma (Ruchiru)
character.description: Rhyanna`s Misdreavus had a Pokemon battle with her younger brother in which it defeated his Murkrow fairly easily. He didn`t like the fact that he was defeated so easily and got mad at his sister. With the help of her Misdreavus, Brock found the Dusk Stone under a large rock but Team Rocket showed up and tried to take the Dusk Stone. Misdreavus was captured with Meowth`s net which shocked it when it tried to get away. Brock`s Sudowoodo was unable to defeat the large mecha and it captured Lucile, Misdreavus and the Dusk Stone. It wasn`t until Mitchell arrived that it was rescued.

character.name: Mytyl
character.description: Mitchell had a Pokemon battle with his older sister in which she defeated his Murkrow fairly easily. He didn`t like the fact that he was defeated so easily and got mad at his sister and ran off. Mitchell began practicing with his Murkrow by throwing things at it to help it deflect things. Unknowingly, he began to throw more and more at his Murkrow until it was unable to deflect the incoming rocks and got hurt. Murkrow got mad and flew off. Team Rocket showed up and tried to take the Dusk Stone and his sister`s Misdreavus. Mitchell made up with his Murkrow and asked it to help save his sister and her Misdreavus. It agreed and was able to help defeat Team Rocket. After his sister was rescued, Mitchell made up and apologized to his sister. The character`s Japanese name is taken from the character of the same name in Maurice Maeterlinck`s The Blue Bird, which his episode was heavily based on.

character.name: Yamikarasu (Mytyl)
character.description: Mitchell had a Pokemon battle with his older sister in which she defeated his Murkrow fairly easily. He didn`t like the fact that he was defeated so easily and got mad at his sister and ran off. Mitchell began practicing with his Murkrow by throwing things at it to help it deflect things. Unknowingly, he began to throw more and more at his Murkrow until it was unable to deflect the incoming rocks and got hurt. Murkrow got mad and flew off. Ash and his friends first encountered Murkrow when it created two illusions. First it created a Giratina which almost squished Ash and the second one was a flood which Ash and his friends thought they were going to drown. Mitchell made up with his Murkrow and asked it to help save his sister and her Misdreavus. It agreed and was able to help defeat Team Rocket.

character.name: Noa
character.description: Noa was at Dawn`s house when Dawn returned home to Twinleaf Town with Ash and Brock for the Twinleaf Town Festival. Brock like all the girls he meets on his travels, instantly began flirting with her, but her overprotective Bellossom and his Croagunk quickly put a stop to that. Noa is a Pokémon Coordinator that is studying with Dawn`s mother Johanna to become better.

character.name: Kireihana (Noa)
character.description: Noa`s Bellossom was first seen coming down the staircase at Dawn`s house with her trainer Noa. Brock like all the girls he meets on his travels, instantly began flirting with Noa, but Bellossom was overprotective of her and quickly put a stop to his flirting with its Stun Spore.

character.name: Nayuta
character.description: Nayuta is a small boy that Ash met in a forest near Twinleaf Town. Like Ash did at his age, Nayuta dreams of becoming a Pokémon Trainer and he spends his time watching wild Pokémon. Ash`s Pikachu seemed to like Nayuta right away and gave it a hug. While Ash and Nayuta were talking, a whild Heracross appeard. Ash told to him that he caught his own Heracross earlier in his journey.

character.name: Mobuo
character.description: Mobuo entered the Suiren Pokémon Contest and managed to make it to the second round. He was matched up against Dawn who sent out her Manmoo for it`s contest debut. Manmoo managed to knock out his Granbull and Mobuo was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Granbull (Mobuo)
character.description: Mobuo`s Granbull entered the Suiren Pokémon Contest and managed to make it to the second round. He was matched up against Dawn who sent out her Manmoo for it`s contest debut. Manmoo managed to knock out his Granbull and Mobuo was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Kodama-hakase
character.description: Professor Kodama had a lab just behind a Pokemon Center where he was working on a machine that would make Pokemon like each other. He was getting mad with his machine because it wasn`t working on his Magnemite and Quagsire. The machine was in fact working and it wasn`t till Ash and his friends showed up with Pikachu and Piplup that he realized that his machine worked. Team Rocket who had been with him at the lab, quickly decides to steal the machine. His machine ended up getting destroyed and returned all the Pokemon in the area back to normal.

character.name: Nuoh (Kodama-hakase)
character.description: Professor Kodama`s Quagsire lives with him at his lab. It wasn`t getting alone with Magnemite so Professor Kodama decided to make a machine that would get them to like each other. Unfortunately it didn`t work on either of them. When the machine was stolen by Team Rocket, Quagsire used its Water Gun to project Magnemite really fast towards the balloon to stop Team Rocket. Working together, Magnemite and Quagsire were able to start to patch things up between them.

character.name: Coil (Kodama-hakase)
character.description: Professor Kodama`s Magnemite lives with him at his lab. It wasn`t getting alone with Quagsire so Professor Kodama decided to make a machine that would get them to like each other. Unfortunately it didn`t work on either of them. When the machine was stolen by Team Rocket, Quagsire used its Water Gun to project Magnemite really fast towards the balloon to stop Team Rocket. Magnemite cut the rope hanging from the balloon, breaking the machine in the process. Working together, Magnemite and Quagsire were able to start to patch things up between them.

character.name: Shitsuji
character.description: Sebastian is the butler in one of James`s many mansions that is located in a forest close to Daybreak Town. He was watching over James`s Growlithe, Growlie, when Ash and his friends stopped by there. He immediately recognised the treasure chest that they had come upon as one belonging to his master, and to prove it, he showed them the drawing of Growlie that was on it. After seeing the treasure chest, he concluded that James would be on his way there, which made him extremely happy and impatient at the same time. He invited Ash and his friends to the mansion and offered them some snacks and cakes in return for discovering his master`s lost object. When Growlie blew James`s disguise, even though he was really happy to see his master back, he immediately turned on capturing him. He even ordered his Spinarak to use String Shot in order to tie him down, so that he could accomplish his mission, which was to return James to his parents. However, his Pokémon was completely overpowered by James`s Mime Jr. and the Teeter Dance attack caused him and Spinarak to become confused. This gave James the chance to use one of the mansion`s secret traps to keep him away for a short while. He seems to be very loyal to Jessiebelle, but couldn`t tell Jessie apart from her, when she was disguised as James`s fiancée in one of Team Rocket`s efforts to retrieve James`s lost object. Even when trapped, he managed to contact her and she arrived at the mansion shortly after. He revealed the secret passageway his master used as an escape route to her and together, they started chasing after James. After Ash and Brock sealed the exit using some boulders, he offered to open the door by force for Jessiebelle. Due to his strength not being enough to knock down the boulders on the other side, she used her Vileplume`s Solarbeam attack to open the sealed exit. Seeing as there was no other way to escape from Jessiebelle and his mischievous butler, James asked Ash to have his Pikachu use Thunderbolt on him, Jessie and Meowth. Ash agreed and thus, James managed to escape from Sebastian.

character.name: Itomaru (Shitsuji)
character.description: Sebastian`s Spinarak was sent out to try to capture James but was quickly outmatched by James` Mr. Mime.

character.name: Air Battle Master Mitsuzoh
character.description: McCann is an old man who lives in a very windy and mountainous area near Daybreak Town. Ash and his friends first met him when they got lost in the woods and came upon the valley where McCann and his granddaughter were having a battle. He is an expert when it comes to midair Pokémon battles, and that`s why he`s called an Air Battle Master. However, he has retired and rarely battles anymore, apart from having practice battles with his granddaughter Maya from time to time. Even though many Pokémon trainers have asked him to either take them on as apprentices or, if that can`t be done, to at least train their Pokémon to become stronger in air battles, he has turned them all down, because he didn`t see any potential in the trainers` Pokémon. He owns a Scizor which he has trained in order to take advantage of the wind currents when it battles. He used that Scizor against Ash`s Gliscor, when Ash asked the Air Battle Master to have a battle with him so that he could test his Gliscor`s strength. The battle ended in an absolute victory for Scizor due to it skillfully using the wind currents to dodge Gliscor`s attacks. After seeing that Gliscor was unable to land a single hit on Scizor, he advised Ash to practice on how to `read` the wind movements along with his Pokémon, so that it can become stronger. He later accepted another battle challenge from Ash. Using his Scizor again, he battled against a stronger Gliscor, but still managed to win. He was amazed, though, by Gliscor`s overnight improvement, as well as its strong, newly-learned Giga Impact attack, and offered Ash to train his Pokémon. Ash accepted the offer after noticing his Gliscor`s will to become stronger, and thus left it in McCann`s care.

character.name: Hassam (Air Battle Master Mitsuzoh)
character.description: Air Battle Master McCann owns a powerful Scizor, which he has trained in order to skillfully use the wind currents when it is battling in midair with other Pokémon. Ash and his friends first saw it when it was battling against a Chimecho in a practice battle between McCann and his granddaughter. It later battled against Ash`s Gliscor and managed to avoid all of its opponent`s attacks by taking advantage of the wind, which led to its absolute victory over Gliscor. Scizor was used again by McCann in his rematch battle with Ash, but this time Gliscor proved to be a more challenging opponent with its newly-learned Giga Impact attack. Scizor, however, managed to pull a close win using its powerful Hyper Beam attack.

character.name: Mayo
character.description: Maya is Air Battle Master McCann`s granddaughter. She helps her grandfather train Pokémon to become stronger in midair battles and even acts as his opponent in practice battles from time to time. She was surprised that Ash didn`t know who her grandfather was, and she was the one who later told him and his friends more about the Air Battle Master.

character.name: Rebecca
character.description: Rebecca is the Pokémon Co-ordinator that Zoey faced in the final round of the Mecabbage Town Pokémon Contest. She owns a Shuckle that battled against Zoey`s Glameow in the final battle of the contest. Even though, at first, she was giving Zoey a hard time by skillfully using her Shuckle`s Withdraw attack, she ended up losing to Zoey after Glameow penetrated Shuckle`s defenses with a powerful Shadow Claw, and then knocked it out using Iron Tail.

character.name: Tsubotsubo (Rebecca)
character.description: Rebecca`s Shuckle is the Pokémon that Zoey`s Glameow faced off against in the final battle of the Mecabbage Town Pokémon Contest. Zoey`s Glameow proved to be a fast opponent for it, as it dodged effectively Shuckle`s Constrict attack. However, its powerful defenses gave Glameow a hard time, as its Fury Swipes couldn`t damage it at all when it was hiding inside its shell. Eventually, after Shuckle`s defenses were penetrated by its opponent`s Shadow Claw, it was knocked out by Glameow`s Iron Tail attack, which earned Zoey the victory and her fifth ribbon.

character.name: Leafia (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Leafeon was first seen in a practice contest battle against Dawn in Mecabbage Town. It battled alongside Zoey`s Kirlia against Dawn`s Mamoswine and Cyndaquil. Zoey effectively combined her Kirlia`s and Leafeon`s Magical Leaf attacks with Kirlia`s Psychic to knock out both of Dawn`s Pokémon with a single hit.

character.name: Kirlia (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Kirlia was first seen in a practice contest battle against Dawn in Mecabbage Town. It battled alongside Zoey`s Leafeon against Dawn`s Mamoswine and Cyndaquil. Zoey effectively combined her Kirlia`s and Leafeon`s Magical Leaf attacks with Kirlia`s Psychic to knock out both of Dawn`s Pokémon with a single hit.

character.name: Tatsu Baasan
character.description: While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends get lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Tatsu`s Altaria`s Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from. Grandma Wilma introduces herself to the group. Grandma Wilma is based off the Route 210 Dragon type Pokémon tutor who teaches Draco Meteor to trainers Pokémon. When a wild Fukamaru appears and latches its jaws onto Satoshi`s head, Grandma Wilma was able to calm it down by massaging it in specific locations.

character.name: Tyltalis (Tatsu Baasan)
character.description: While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends get lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Wilma`s Altaria` Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from. Grandma Wilma`s Altaria was captured by Rocket Gang and Satoshi and friends rescued it with the help of Fukamaru who managed to use Draco Meteor on the damaged ball that Altaria had previously cracked.

character.name: Fukamaru (Satoshi)
character.description: While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends got lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Tatsu`s Altaria`s Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from. Grandma Wilma introduces herself to the group. Grandma Wilma is based off the Route 210 Dragon type Pokémon tutor who teaches Draco Meteor to trainers Pokémon. A Gible appeared on the field as Altaria was practicing and tried to use Draco Meteor as well. It had a hard time getting the move to work properly and it kept hitting Hikari`s Pochama. After leaving Grandma Tatsu, Gible followed Satoshi and his friends and Satoshi later captured it after a battle with his rival Jun.

character.name: Kijuurou
character.description: Clayton is a Pokémon trainer that challenged Ash and his Buizel to a battle near the shores of a river while on route to Asatsuki Town. Clayton has been using the area as his field to eagerly train against Pokémon with his Mr. Mime for many years. Clayton`s Mr. Mime defeated Buizel in the first battle, but Buizel was able to defeat it in the rematch. Clayton and Mr. Mime both enjoyed Brock`s meal which was prepared after the first battle with Ash and they were both grateful that he prepared it for them. Clayton also helped Ash`s Buizel train so that it could learn Ice Punch.

character.name: Barrierd (Kijuurou)
character.description: Clayton`s Mr. Mime defeated Buizel in the first battle in which they faced each other, but Buizel was able to defeat it in the rematch. Clayton and Mr. Mime both enjoyed Brock`s meal which was prepared after the first battle with Ash and they were both grateful that he prepared it for them.

character.name: Yuuta
character.description: Yuuta is a Pokethlon competitor and uses science and computers to improve and check his Pokemon`s performance. Yuuta and his Kabigon encountered Satoshi and his friends in the forest where they were training. He invited them back to his lab to show them his training setup. After telling them about an upcoming Pokethlon event he was going to enter, Satoshi decided he would enter as well. Catch Saucer (キャッチソーサー) was the first event that Yuuta entered and he competed with his Sawamular. He left his Kabigon unknowingly in the hands of the Rocket Gang who were posing as masseuses. When he returned to get his Kabigon for the Dash Hurdle (ダッシュハードル) event, Rocket Gang tried to get away but Kabigon was connected to the balloon with a rope and its weight prevented them from escaping. Musashi sent out her Yanamega to cut the rope, but Kabigon used a trampoline from the Bound Field (バウンドフィールド) event to send Rocket Gang flying and free Pikachu. In the final event, Yuuta`s Kabigon went up against Satoshi`s Pikachu. It ended up being a photo finish as Kabigon barely won. Yuuta ended up winning the Tsubaki Town Pokéthlon.

character.name: Sawamular (Yuuta)
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch24530 [Yuuta]`s Sawamular competed in the Catch Saucer (キャッチソーサー) event at the Tsubaki Town Pokéthlon. Yuuta and his Sawamular competed well but ended up tied with Satoshi and his Monferno.

character.name: Kabigon (Yuuta)
character.description: Yuuta`s Kabigon encountered Satoshi and his friends in the forest and bounced Pikachu and Pochama off the trampoline it was training on. Yuuta unknowingly left his Kabigon in the hands of the Rocket Gang who were posing as masseuses. When Yuuta returned to get Kabigon for the Dash Hurdle (ダッシュハードル) event, Rocket Gang tried to get away but Kabigon was connected to the balloon with a rope and its weight prevented them from escaping. Musashi sent out her Yanamega to cut the rope, but Kabigon used a trampoline from the Bound Field (バウンドフィールド) event to send Rocket Gang flying and free Pikachu. In the Dash Hurdle (ダッシュハードル) event, Yuuta`s Kabigon went up against Satoshi`s Pikachu. It ended up being a photo finish as Kabigon barely won. Yuuta ended up winning the Tsubaki Town Pokethlon and Kabigon was seen on the podium receiving a wreath.

character.name: Purin (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Jigglypuff was first seen participating in the Asatsuki Town Pokémon Contest with Ursula`s Gabite. It spun around a few times on Gabite`s claw gaining a lot of popularity from the crowd and judges when it was also able to spin with out getting hurt when Gabite used Dragon Claw.

character.name: Minun (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Minun was first seen in the practice yard for the Asatsuki Town Pokémon Contest. As soon as Dawn saw it, she became extremely frightened of it. It ended up shocking Dawn causing her hair to go frizzly and sparkle.

character.name: Prasle (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Plusle was first seen in the practice yard for the Asatsuki Town Pokémon Contest. As soon as Dawn saw it, she became extremely frightened of it. It ended up shocking Dawn causing her hair to go frizzly and sparkle.

character.name: Dodaitose (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Torterra was revealed during the Japanese opening `The Greatest-Everyday!`. It evolved during a battle against Rocket Gang when they commandeered Nagisa Tower. Denji`s Raichu and Satoshi`s Pikachu were injured by Rocket Gang and in order to protect them it used its new move Leaf Storm which it learned after evolving.

character.name: Togekiss (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn`s Togekiss was revealed during the Japanese opening `The Greatest-Everyday!". Princess Salvia gave her Togekiss to Dawn to help her in the Grand Festival as thanks for trading places with her so she could participate in the Katakuri Town Pokémon Contest.

character.name: Goukazaru (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Infernape was revealed during the Japanese opening `The Greatest-Everyday!`. It evolved a few episodes after the airing of opening in DP163. During a battle against Barry, Monferno was hit by Empoleon`s Hydro Cannon and was sent flying into the nearby forest. When Team Rocket captured the Pokémon and were about to get away, Monferno returned in rage and began destroying their mecha. Ash managed to stop Monferno, but while Paul`s Electabuzz was holding the broken mecha up, it couldn`t hold it any longer and Monferno came to the rescue. While it was rescuing Piplup, Empoleon and Pikachu, it evolved into Infernape.

character.name: Hikozaru (Ooba)
character.description: Flint`s Chimchar was seen during a flashback sequence which explained how Flint and Volkner first met. As a young trainer, Flint often challenged trainers with his Chimchar which was very strong. Flint`s Chimchar managed to defeat Volkner`s Pikachu in their first meeting in an alleyway, but was finally defeated in a future rematch battle between the two.

character.name: Goukazaru (Ooba)
character.description: Flint`s Infernape was first seen when Ash was captured by the autodefence hands of the Sunyshore Gym. Flint sent out his Infernape to rescue Ash. After Flint friend and rival Volkner, leader of the Sunyshore Gym wasn`t willing to participate in a battle for a gym badge with Ash, Flint agreed to battle Ash hoping it would motivate Volkner again. Flint`s Infernape defeated Ash`s Pokémon in a battle at the Sunyshore Gym which featured Ash`s Infernape, Buizel and Pikachu.

character.name: Denji
character.description: Volkner is the Gym Leader of Sunyshore Gym. His rival and childhood friend is the Elite Four member Flint. Ash arrived at the Sunyshore Gym gym to have a battle with Volkner but he was depressed and did not want to battle trainers anymore. He left a box of gym badges at the entrance to the gym but Ash wasn`t satisfied with receiving a badge without battling. After encountering Flint outside the Sunyshore Gym, Flint took Ash and his friends to the Sunyshore Tower where they met Volkner. After Ash had a battle with Flint, Volkner agreed to have a battle with Ash.

character.name: Pikachu (Denji)
character.description: Volkner`s Pikachu was seen in a flashback seen where Flint`s Chimchar managed to defeat Volkner`s Pikachu in their first meeting in an alleyway. During a rematch between the two Pokémon, Pikachu was finally defeated Flint`s Chimchar with its powerful Iron Tail. It eventually evolved into Raichu.

character.name: Raichuu (Denji)
character.description: Volkner`s Raichu was first seen as Ash and his friends as well as Flint exited the elevator near the top of the Sunyshore Tower. At first it looked very protective but as soon as Raichu saw Flint it quickly jumped into Flint`s arms and gave it a big hug.

character.name: Master
character.description: The full name of Volkner and Flint`s Master is unknown. He was first seen in a restaurant in Sunyshore City serving food to Ash and his friends. In a flashback scene, Flint described his first encounter with him as he and Volkner battled the Master`s Houndoom together. They were both defeated and the three ended up becoming friends.

character.name: Hellgar (Master)
character.description: In a flashback scene, Flint described his first encounter with Master as he and Volkner battled the Master`s Houndoom together. They were both defeated by the Master`s Houndoom and the three ended up becoming friends. Master`s Houndoom was also seen at the Sunyshore Gym during the battle between Flint and Ash.

character.name: Natsuya
character.description: Natsuya is an experienced Pokémon Ranger who is sent out on important missions. During a mission to saves Latios, Red Eye managed to stun Natsuya and the Mukuhawk he was riding on and he plummeted into the ocean. Natsuya was tossed up on shore where he encountered Ukulele Pichu hiding behind a tree. The Pichu watched quietly until Natsuya approached it and tried to capture it. During a mission to investigate the mysterious eruption in a volcano, Natsuya encounters a wild Heatran. He attempts to capture it but he looses his Capture Styler which James eventually finds. Natsuya managed to use the Ranger Sign for Feraligatr and the Feraligatr takes him to shore where Ash and his friends are camped out. Natsuya introduces himself and that he is a Pokémon Ranger on a mission. Ash and his friend decide to help him out but as usual Team Rocket interferes. By working together, Natsuya is able to recover his Capture Styler and capture the wild Heatran.

character.name: Rentorar (Denji)
character.description: Volkner`s Luxray was the first Pokémon that Volkner sent out to battle against Ash at the Sunyshore Gym. The battle was interrupted when the power went out and the match could not be decided. During Ash`s Gym battle, it was the last Pokémon Volkner sent out. It was able to defeat Pikachu but Ash`s Infernape proved to be too powerful for it.

character.name: Takumi
character.description: Takumi is a student of the Beach Pokémon School. Dawn and her friends were asked by Johanna`s if they would help out at the school. Takumi started off as a trouble maker and a bit of a brat. He pulled Dawn`s Piplup`s face and teased it a lot to the point that it got mad and started chasing him. He also wasn`t impressed that Dawn and friends were his teachers but he eventually turned around after Dawn showed him her contest combination moves. After Pachirisu and Buneary were able to perfect Dawn`s new combination move, he and Piplup both were cheering them as they attempted the move. Takumi and Piplup found a common ground while they were cheering and became friends and splashed around in the water.

character.name: Mai
character.description: While walking in a forest near Sunyshore, Marley encountered a Shaymin that Team Rocket was attempting to catch and give to the boss. She decided to protect it from them and managed to hide them by laying in a boat and floating down stream. She meets Ash and his friends and they help her out of the boat. After stopping to feed their Pokémon, she reveals that she was hiding Shaymin. Brock realizes Shaymin is injured and gives it some berries. Marley explains that she was being chased by Team Rocket who shows up again and attempts to capture Shaymin again. With the help of Ash and friends, Marley manages to get Shaymin to a field of Gracidea Flowers and it transforms into Sky Forme Shaymin and defeats Team Rocket. In the field, a bunch of other Shaymin reveal themselves after Team Rocket leaves.

character.name: Windie (Mai)
character.description: While walking in a forest, Marley encountered a Shaymin that Team Rocket was attempting to catch and give to the boss. She decided to protect it and she rode on her Arcanine to get away from them.

character.name: Natsuya no Sofu-san
character.description: Natsuya`s grandpa was seen in a flashback scene. Natsuya recalled that his grandpa was always encouraging him and getting him to strive to do better.

character.name: Yooshichi
character.description: While heading to the Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort, Ash and friends meet Yoshichi who instantly wanted to play with Pikachu after he saw it. After speaking for while, Ash and friends asked if he had any Pokémon of his own. He explained that he left his Magby at a Pokémon evolution shop. Suspicious of the shop, they returned to find that the owners had left and the shop was gone. With the help of Ash and his friends, Yoshichi was able to track down the thieves who ended up being Team Rocket. Ash and Dawn battled Team Rocket and were able to recover Magby`s Poké ball.

character.name: Buby (Yooshichi)
character.description: Team Rocket was running a Pokémon evolution shop and saw Yoshichi and his Magby walk by. They explained that if he left his Magby at a Pokémon evolution shop with them, when he returned it would be an evolved Magmar. Suspicious of the shop, Ash and his friends returned there to find that the owners had left and the shop was gone. Yoshichi was able to track down the thieves who ended up being Team Rocket. Ash and Dawn battled Team Rocket and were able to recover Magby`s Poké ball.

character.name: Glion (Kikuno)
character.description: Bertha`s Gliscor was sent out to attack Team Rocket`s balloon after Ash`s Staraptor was knocked down by Meowth`s latest invention. Bertha`s Gliscor was able to pop the balloon, causing Team Rocket to crash.

character.name: Kabarudon (Kikuno)
character.description: After Team Rocket was disposed of and were sent flying away, Ash asked Bertha for a battle which she agreed to. She sent out her Hippowdon to battle against Ash`s Torterra. After a fierce battle between the two, Hippowdon was victorious.

character.name: Golonya (Kikuno)
character.description: Bertha`s Golem was sent out to attack Team Rocket once they put armor on Seviper and Carnivine which made them stronger than they normally would be. Golem was able to use its Rock Blast attack to take down Seviper and Carnivine.

character.name: Princess Salvia
character.description: Princess Salvia lives in a palace in Katakuri Town (カタクリタウン) . She switched places with Dawn since they look almost the same and then participated in the Katakuri Town Pokémon Contest with her Togekiss. In the final round, she faced Jessie and was able to defeat her after Dawn was able to encourage her enough to battle back. Realizing that Jessie needed the ribbon from the contest to enter the Grand Festival, she gave her the ribbon. Princess Salvia gave her Togekiss to Dawn to help her in the Grand Festival as thanks for trading places with her.

character.name: Freesia
character.description: Freesia is Princess Salvia`s assistant and she lives in a palace in Katakuri Town (カタクリタウン). She went to find Dawn to ask her to meet Princess Salvia at the palace. During the entire time Dawn and Princess Salvia had switched places, she kept the secret so the butler did not find out.

character.name: Princess Salvia no Shitsuji
character.description: Princess Salvia`s Butler is very strict and proper and lives in the palace in Katakuri Town. He wasn`t aware that Princess Salvia traded places with Dawn so she could compete in the Katakuri Town Pokémon Contest.

character.name: Makina
character.description: Makina is a Pokémon Trainer that Ash and his friends met in a forest on route to the nearby the Lakeside Resort. She often tells people to call her by her nickname "Rissa" in the English dub. Her Ditto`s had wandered away from her and started causing trouble as they were transforming into Pikachu, Piplup and Gible which made those Pokémon angry and get into fights with the Ditto`s. She is big fan of the Sinnoh Elite Four member Flint and she dresses up just like him. She also had a small crush on Brock as he helped her with her battling techniques, but that quickly ended when she saw him go after another girl that was walking by in the forest. She also battled against Ash and copied his Pokémon in the battle, but his experience and the strength of his Pokémon proved to be too much for her and he was able to win easily.

character.name: Metamon #1 (Makina)
character.description: Makina`s Ditto, Number 1, is a normally colored Ditto that transformed into Gible. Her Ditto`s had wandered away from her and started causing trouble for Ash and his friends as they were transforming into their Pokémon and making them mad. During a battle with Ash, it transformed into Piplup but Pikachu`s Thunderbolt was effective against it. It then transformed into a Pikachu, but was no match for Ash`s Pikachu. Team Rocket stole the Ditto`s and planned to give them to the boss but Ash and his friends were able to recover both of them.

character.name: Metamon #2 (Makina)
character.description: Makina`s Ditto, Number 2, is a teal colored Ditto that transformed into Piplup and Pikachu. Her Ditto`s had wandered away from her and started causing trouble for Ash and his friends as they were transforming into their Pokémon and making them mad. During a battle with Ash, it transformed into Infernape but was no match for Ash`s Infernape. Team Rocket stole the Ditto`s and planned to give them to the boss but Ash and his friends were able to recover both of them.

character.name: Emperte (Kengo)
character.description: During the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort, it was revealed during the Appeal round that Kenny`s Prinplup had evolved into an Empoleon. It Luster Cannon proved to be too powerful for his Floatzel to handle and it resulted in Kenny not advancing to the next round.

character.name: Floazel (Kengo)
character.description: During the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort, it was revealed during the Appeal round that Kenny had a Floatzel. It was entered into that round with his Empoleon but Empoleon`s Luster Cannon proved to be too powerful for Floatzel to handle and it resulted in Kenny not advancing to the next round.

character.name: Tyltalis (Naoshi)
character.description: During the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort, Nando`s Altaria was revealed during the Appeal round. It was able to perform well enough for Nando to advance to the next round.

character.name: Korobohshi (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando`s Kricketot is not the original form of his Kricketune as they are two separate Pokémon. During the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort, Kricketot was revealed during the Appeal round. It was able to perform well enough for Nando to advance to the next round.

character.name: Eievui #1 (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Eevee was revealed during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort. It evolved during the Appeal round.

character.name: Eievui #2 (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Eevee was revealed during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort. It evolved during the Appeal round.

character.name: Booster (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Eevee evolved into Flareon during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort. She threw a Fire Stone up in the air as part of her Appeal performance.

character.name: Showers (Urara)
character.description: Ursula`s Eevee evolved into Vaporeon during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort. She threw a Water Stone up in the air as part of her Appeal performance.

character.name: Toritodon (Nozomi)
character.description: It was revealed during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort that Zoey`s Shellos had evolved into a Gastrodon. With it`s assistance, Zoey was able to advanced to the next round of the Grand Festival.

character.name: Neorant (Nozomi)
character.description: It was revealed during the Appeal round of the Sinnoh Grand Festival at the Lakeside Resort that Zoey`s Finneon had evolved into Lumineon. With it`s assistance, Zoey was able to advanced to the next round of the Grand Festival.

character.name: Mumage (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Misdreavus evolved into Mismagius sometime before the Sinnoh Grand Festival. It was first seen participating in the semi-final round against Nando where it helped defeat his Lopunny and Roserade to advance Zoey to the finals.

character.name: Roserade (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando`s Roselia evolved into Roserade sometime before the Sinnoh Grand Festival. It was first seen participating in the semi-final round against Zoey where it was defeated due to the 5 minute time constraint.

character.name: Mimilop (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando captured a Lopunny sometime before the Sinnoh Grand Festival. It was first seen participating in the semi-final round against Zoey where it was defeated due to the 5 minute time constraint.

character.name: Ellade (Nozomi)
character.description: Zoey`s Gallade was first seen in the final of the Sinnoh Grand Festival. It had evolved into Gallade sometime before its appearance in the final battle. It was able to help Zoey win the Grand Festival by defeating Dawn`s Pokémon.

character.name: Mamii
character.description: Mamie is a Pokémon Trainer on her way to battle Crasher Wake at the Pastoria City Gym. Her Glameow finds Team Rocket`s Meowth unconscious behind a rock and she helps it get better. Meowth wakes up and instantly falls in love with Mamie`s Glameow. Jessie and James appear and thank Mamie for helping Meowth and they drag him away from Mamie`s Glameow. Mamie continues journeying towards Pastoria City and encounters Ash and his friends. Meowth decides that he wants Team Rocket to capture Glameow to give it to the boss. They manage to take Glameow`s Poke ball but Ash and his friends manage to track Meowth down. During a battle with Meowth, Team Rocket, Ash and Dawn, Mamie`s Glameow evolves into Purugly. Meowth loses interest and allows Mamie and her Purugly to continue on their journey together.

character.name: Bunyat (Mamii)
character.description: Mamie`s Purugly evolved during a battle with Meowth, Team Rocket, Ash and Dawn. Meowth gets squished by Purugly and then it kicks dirt at him. Meowth loses interest and allows Mamie and her Purugly to continue on their journey together.

character.name: Nyarmar (Mamii)
character.description: Glameow finds Team Rocket`s Meowth unconscious behind a rock and she helps it get better. Meowth wakes up and instantly falls in love with Mamie`s Glameow. They have lunch together as Jessie and James appear and thank Mamie for helping Meowth as they drag him away from Mamie`s Glameow. Meowth decides that he wants Team Rocket to capture Glameow to give it to the boss but his ulterior motive is to run away with Glameow. Meowth and Glameow spend some time together as he tries to convince and charm her but Ash and his friends manage to track Meowth down. During a battle, Mamie`s Glameow evolves into Purugly. Meowth loses interest and allows Mamie and her Purugly to continue on their journey together.

character.name: Thunders (Denji)
character.description: Volkner`s Jolteon was the second Pokémon that Volkner sent out to battle against Ash. It was matched up with Ash`s Infernape who manged to easily defeat it with a powerful Mach Punch that sent it flying into the Gym`s ceiling and then fell to the ground.

character.name: Elekible (Denji)
character.description: Volkner`s Electivire was the first Pokémon he sent out to battle Ash for his Gym badge. It was matched up against Ash`s Torterra which it was able to defeat after taking an early beating. It then had to face Ash`s Pikachu but Pikachu`s Iron Tail proved to be too much for it and was defeated.

character.name: Katsuzoo
character.description: Crispin is a mountain guardian patrolling the mountains the area that Jibacoil and Metagross reside in. He met up with Ash and his friends as well as Officer Jenny and explained to them that the area that the Pokémon battle in is filled with water. He explained that everywhere in the mountains, there is magnetism and sometimes, the mountains send out strange magnetic forces. Jibacoil and Metagross would battle in the mountain cavity to get rid of that magnetism that collected on their bodies.

character.name: Moukazaru (Ooba)
character.description: Flint`s Monferno was seen during a flashback scene battling a Snorlax during the Pokémon League. It was the final opponent they would face but the Snorlax proved to be strong competitor.

character.name: Baku
character.description: While on route to Suzuran Island, Ash and friends meet Buck on the ship taking them to the Sinnoh League. Buck is a treasure hunter and he shows them a treasure map. Ash and his friends ask to help Beck find the treasure. He agrees and the group begins searching for the treasure. After avoiding many Pokémon and obstacles on the way, they arrived at an ancient stone pyramid. A Claydon appears and takes care of Team Rocket but Buck was determined to capture it. Using his Baltoy, he was able to weaken the Claydon and capture it. After capturing the Claydon, a box appears with many ancient artefacts which he was happy to find although Ash and friends were hoping for golden treasure.

character.name: Yajilon (Baku)
character.description: Buck`s Baltoy seems to be Buck`s main Pokémon and it stays out of its Poké ball most of the time as they travel around. A Claydon appeared at the pyramid they arrived at looking for treasure and Buck was determined to capture it. Using his Baltoy, he was able to weaken the Claydon and capture it.

character.name: Nendoll (Baku)
character.description: A Claydon appeared at the pyramid ruins they arrived at looking for treasure and Buck was determined to capture it. Using his Baltoy, he was able to weaken the Claydon and capture it. Claydon was the guardian deity of the treasure in the forest ruins until it was captured by Buck. A trap would summon it when people stepped on the stone.

character.name: Big
character.description: Big is a Pokémon Trainer that was seen in a flashback scene battling Flint and his Monferno during the Pokémon League. "Big" is possibly the nickname given to him by Flint as he was using Snorlax, a big Pokémon to battle Flint. Also, Big is quite large in stature.

character.name: Kabigon (Big)
character.description: Big`s Snorlax was seen during a flashback scene battling Flint`s Monferno during the Pokémon League. It proved to be strong competitor and was able to pin Monferno with its Body Slam.

character.name: Magmarashi (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Cyndaquil was recalled from Oak`s laboratory for the Sinnoh League but Team Rocket stole its Poké ball during the transfer. Pikachu shocked Team Rocket to get the Poké balls back but it sent them flying into the air. Ash recovered them but they were empty. Cyndaquil was the final Pokémon he located after recovering the Poké balls but it was cornered by Team Rocket`s mecha. During the battle with the mecha as it was about to be captured, it evolved into Quilava and was able to destroy the mecha.

character.name: Shimako
character.description: Shimako is the manager of the vendors for the Sinnoh League. She ran a lottery to see which areas people would be responsible for but Musashi ended up picking area number 139 which was in a remote section of the stadium. When Rocket Gang ran their booth, Shimako was quite impressed with their selling skills as she scouted them out.

character.name: Armaldo (Naoshi)
character.description: Nando`s Armaldo was first revealed in the Sinnoh League battle against Ash. It was sent out to battle Staraptor after it defeated Nando`s Roserade. Armaldo was quickly able to defeat a weakened Staraptor and then ended up being knocked out at the same time as Ash`s Quilava.

character.name: Elekible (Shinji)
character.description: During his battle with Barry, Paul revealed that his Electabuzz evolved into a Electivire. It proved to be even stronger and was able to defeat Barry`s Empoleon to win the match.

character.name: Airmd (Jun)
character.description: Barry sent out his Skarmory as his first Pokémon to battle against Paul during their battle at the Sinnoh League. It was quickly defeated by Paul`s Magmortar as it had the type advantage.

character.name: Sawamular (Jun)
character.description: Barry`s Hitmonlee was revealed during the battle with Paul at the Sinnoh League. After his Empoleon defeated Magmortar, Barry sent out his Hitmonlee to face Ursaring. Ursaring proved to be a strong opponent and was able to eventually defeat Hitmonlee.

character.name: Takuto
character.description: Takuto was first discussed about by Barry who explained that he heard about Takuto because he was fighting with a Darkrai.
