Later, Conway revealed that Takuto managed to get all his badges and get through the first and second fighting rounds with just Darkrai. It wasn`t until he faced Ash that his Darkrai was defeated. Takuto defeated Ash and moved onto the Sinnoh League finals where his Darkrai defeated his opponent by itself once again. Takuto became the Sinnoh League Champion.

character.name: Darkrai (Takuto)
character.description: In the eight Gym matches leading up to the League, Darkrai was the only Pokémon Takuto used to battle against the gym leaders and was able to win all the matches. Takuto`s Darkrai also managed to get through the first and second fighting rounds of the Sinnoh League all by itself. Satoshi`s Sceptile finally managed to defeated it.

character.name: Berobelt (Kouhei)
character.description: Conway`s Lickilicky was first seen battling Ash`s Gible during their match in the third battling round at the Sinnoh League. It was defeated by Ash`s Noctowl after Ash switched out his Gible.

character.name: Tsubotsubo (Kouhei)
character.description: Conway`s Shuckle was the first Pokémon Conway sent out to battle against Ash. It proved to be a formidable opponent and Ash used all three of his Pokémon against it until Gible was able to defeat it by using its perfected Draco Meteor.

character.name: Yonoir (Kouhei)
character.description: Conway`s Dusknoir was the final Pokémon that Conway used during his battle against Ash in the third battling round of the Sinnoh League. Dusknoir was able to defeat Ash`s Noctowl and Donphan before Gible was finally able to counter its Shadow Punch.

character.name: Toritodon (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Gastrodon was the second Pokémon Paul sent out to battle against Ash during their full battle at the Sinnoh League. It proved to be a formidable opponent as Ash`s Staraptor pinned it on the ground but a quick change by Ash to recall Staraptor proved to be a good strategy as Ash`s Buizel defeated Paul`s Gastrodon with an Ice Punch.

character.name: Bossgodora (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Aggron was the first Pokémon Paul sent out to battle against Ash during their full battle at the Sinnoh League. It was the first time that Ash and his friends had seen it in its evolved form. Ash`s Pikachu battled against it for a bit until it was recalled and Infernape was sent out to battle. A swift Mach Punch managed to defeat Aggron.

character.name: Dorapion (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Drapion was the third Pokémon Paul sent out to battle against Ash during their full battle at the Sinnoh League. It faced Buizel and managed to pin it with its tail.

character.name: Yukimenoko (Shinji)
character.description: Paul`s Froslass battled against Ash`s Pikachu during the quarter-final round of the Sinnoh League. Pikachu was able to hit it with an Iron Tail and after that point the match favored Pikachu. Pikachu defeated Paul`s Froslass.

character.name: Latios (Takuto)
character.description: Takuto`s Latios was sent out to battle Ash during the semi-final round of the Sinnoh League. Latios had never previously been sent out during any of Takuto`s battles in the Sinnoh League or during his Sinnoh gym matches as his Darkrai had never been defeated until Satoshi`s Sceptile defeated it. Ash`s Pikachu faced Latios and the two ended up knocking each other out at the same time.

character.name: Nobuko
character.description: Normajean is an apprentice working at a Pokémon nursery school. She was caring for a Pichu, Cleffa, Teddiursa, Smoochum, Wynaut, Igglybuff and an Azurill when she met Brock and his friends on the boat to Twinleaf Town. While on board, the Pokémon in her care were attacked by shoal of Tentacruel. With Brock`s help, the Pokémon were all able to recover.

character.name: Lucky (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Chansey evolved on the boat to Twinleaf Town while caring for a bunch of sick Pokémon from a Daycare. It learns Softboiled and was able to heal the sick Pichu.

character.name: Jiguzaguma (Tsuribito)
character.description: In the Sinnoh region, a Fisherman came running with his Zigzagoon that was K.O`d by the Buoysel that Ash and Dawn eventually caught.

character.name: Magmarashi (Hikari)
character.description: Dawn`s Quilava evolved from her Cyndaquil while in the forest near Professor Rowan`s laboratory. While chasing after the escaped Pokémon from Professor Rowan`s laboratory, a ton of Ariados used their String Shot to capture everyone and they could not break free. After Dawn`s Quilava had finished evolving, it was able to break free from the String Shot and was able to fight off the Ariados with Eruption which it had just learned.

character.name: Dosidon (Jirou)
character.description: Forest`s Rhyperior was revealed when Forest sent it out to battle against Nurse Joy to see if Forest was good enough to be the Gym Leader of the Pewter City Gym. Forest`s Rhyperior was up against Nurse Joy`s Latias in the battle but its strength and determination showed that is was trained well by Forest. It`s Dig/Megahorn combination proved to be very effective against Nurse Joy`s Latias but it still wasn`t enough to defeat it. Even though Forest`s Rhyperior lost the battle, Nurse Joy recognized that it was a close battle and she was satisfied with Forest`s ability as a Gym Leader as Forest`s Rhyperior really showcased that to her in the battle.

character.name: Latias (Joy)
character.description: Nurse Joy`s Latias was sent out to battle against Forest`s Rhyperior to see if Forest was worthy to be the Gym Leader of the Pewter City Gym. Brock and his family were all a bit shocked when it was revealed that a Legendary Pokémon was going to battle. Nurse Joy`s Latias was able to withstand countless attacks from Forest`s Rhyperior and ended up winning the battle.

character.name: Shinko
character.description: Shinko is a beginning trainer that was at Professor Rowan lab the day that Dawn went to visit him for the first time after competing in the Sinnoh Grand Festival. Shinko likes to take notes of everything so she doesn`t forget and can review and study at a later time. While she was contemplating which Pokémon she wanted to pick as her first Pokémon, the Piplup and Chimchar began fighting and the window in Professor Rowan lab broke and the two Pokémon quickly jumped out through it. Professor Rowan and Dawn were outside when they heard Shinko scream. Shinko already knew who Dawn was as she had watched her at the Grand Festival. While traveling in the forest together to find the missing Pokémon, Shinko congratulated Dawn and told her that it was an honor to be able to talk to her as she thought Dawn was a great role model and had been studying her techniques. Dawn and Shinko chased after the two escaped Pokémon and were cornered and captured by a group of Ariados. With the help of Dawn`s Quilava, they were able to rescue the Pokémon and return to the lab. The same events happened to Dawn when she was selecting her first Pokémon as well, so Dawn and Shinko share a common experience. Professor Rowan asked Shinko when she returned to the lab after her ordeal in the forest if she had decided what Pokémon she wished to chose as her starter Pokémon. She explained to Professor Rowan that she wanted to wait a bit so she could learn a bit more about them before she made her final decision. Shinko became friends with Dawn after that day and was at the boat dock waving goodbye to Dawn who was off to the Houen region.

character.name: Matori
character.description: Matori is Giovanni`s secretary and a member of Team Rocket. She became his main reference for current operations when the Team Rocket began to infiltrate the Unova region. She kept Jessie, James, Meowth informed of their mission and was the one that suggested they be the Team Rocket members for his special mission there to find out information about Dream Energy and the Meteonite. After the events in the Unova desert, Matori gave Jessie, James, Meowth the runaround when they tried to contact Giovanni and Matori explained that Giovanni was in the middle of an important meeting and couldn`t leave it to talk to them. Matori forwarded Giovanni`s message to them stating, "From now, you`re free to do what you want. Do your best for the sake of the Rocket Gang."

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The first generation of the Shin`ou Pokedex and the Pokedex of the fourth generation.

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The second generation of the Jouto Pokedex and the second Pokedex of the fourth generation.

Una rivale per Lucinda & Una Gara mozzafiato

Dawn i jej pierwsza rywalka
